Chat with people all around the world, without having to join their game!

[h2]This mod requires [url=https://scrapmechanictools.com/modapis/DLLMod/Info]DLLMod[/url] in order to work properly.[/h2]

I might update and improve it or I might just shut it down at some point, I don't know yet.
For now, have fun while it still works :)

WARNING

DO NOT enter ANY personal information!!!

47be694f-eca6-420f-a4f2-79617a664156.description:
Welcome to Larson's Grind-B-Gone mod!

I have created this mod to make the constant grind of procuring resources a bit less. Key tweaks are:

1) Stack sizes are now 512 for everything (well, everything I could find/think of), this means less running back and forth to unload the 20 stacks of scrap wood... or 50 stacks of 5 milk... Bigger stacks = longer resource roams!
** A few items, namely larger ones, are NOT 512; wheels, chests, etc...
2) Stone piles now have a stone:metal ratio of 1:3 intead of 2:1 - Stone is useful, but metal is used more.
3) slight adjustments to assorted loot tables, namely totebots and haybots (you'll see the difference!)
4) replaced the scrap wheel with small wheel in the start area loots.
5) Made the resource drops from clams, oil geysers, flowers, corn, beehives and cotton a bit more varied and robust, no more 1 resource per parent! * this requires that you HIT them, not PICK them (flowers and cotton)

I also, after taking the basic idea from a couple other mods, removed a TON of ground clutter to make it easier to actually SEE more than a foot or two in front of you. (this combines 2 other mods from the workshop and improves them!)

Basically, this mod combines and improves the following:

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2118192552]Remove Fake Trees[/url] by BryOnFire
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2210412816]No Grass Mod[/url] by NothingMod
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2111749421]Stacks+ (Survival)[/url] by SgtMarkoes

PLEASE NOTE: I did not use thier files/code/etc as the base of my own, I merely took their ideas and expanded upon them!

========================================================================
= INSTALLATION =
===============

Simply copy the CONTENTS of the /Modded folder into your Scrap Mechanic install folder:

......\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\

DO NOT COPY THE PARENT (Modded) FOLDER, ONLY THE DATA and SURVIVAL SUB-FOLDERS!

Allow overwriting when prompted.

========================================================================
= UNINSTALLING =
===============

Also included a complete backup of the files I modified. These are used if you no longer wish to run a modded game.

Simply copy the CONTENTS of the - Original - folder into the Scrap Mechanic install folder (see above) and allow overwriting when prompted.

========================================================================
= IMPORTANT =
============

This mod has GODMODE enabled, by default, every time you load into a game (or start a new one). If you don't like this feature, simply open chat (ENTER) and type /god and turn it off.

The information above is also included in the RTFM file inside the mod folder.

Have Fun and PLEASE RATE!
47be694f-eca6-420f-a4f2-79617a664156.name: Larson's Grind-B-Gone

2b914803-8c10-4808-803b-9dc264f2e813.description:
v1.1.1:
- Changed the texture of the Teleporter and the 3 block wide Teleporter
- Updated Teleporter Cube (bigger collision box)

Adds in custom teleporters!
These teleporters are able to transport players, and are linked by color! 

They also output a configurable logic signal when used.

Please leave any bugs in the comments.

Note: these teleporters are untested in multiplayer. They should work, but they may not! This is my first published SM mod, so I am still new to SM networking.

On the note of being new to SM modding...
Thanks to the help provided by the Guild of Scrap Mechanic Modders on Discord! Without the helpful people on that Discord server, this mod may not exist!
2b914803-8c10-4808-803b-9dc264f2e813.name: Teleporters

This mod adds a Paint Brush and a Canvas!
[b]Use 6 different shapes, 40 colours, hundreds of sizes and rotations to express yourself![/b]

[b]Saving the canvas on the lift will save the painting on it![/b] Spawning a painting back in might cause a bit of lag, so beware of that.

[h1]Controls:[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Left Click[/b]: Paint on the canvas
[*][b]Right Click[/b]: Erase painting on canvas
[*][b]Rotate Blocks(default: Q)[/b]: Open settings menu
[*][b]Force Build(default: F)[/b]: Select point to draw a line from
[*][b]Reload(default: R)[/b]: Change the canvas' colour to your selected colour
[/list]

[h1]Credits:[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Vajdani[/b]: programming
[*][b]Illumina[/b]: Paint Brush model and textures
[/list]

bc7932e1-bc7f-4595-865c-2d2f4d94a20e.description:
Have you been annoyed by that backpack that you just cant seem to get rid of? Well you've come to the right place

This mod removes your mechanic's backpack!

It also works in multiplayer, so anyone joining your game will see your mechanic without a backpack.

This mod has to be installed manually

Insallation:

1. Right click on Scrap Mechanic in your steam library
2. Click Manage->Browse Local Files
3. Navigate 2 folders back to "steamapps"
4. Navigate to "workshop\content\387990\MOD ID HERE"
5.Copy the content from the folder given
6. Press your windows key and type "%appdata%"
7. Navigate to "AppData\Roaming\Axolot Games\Scrap Mechanic\User\User_0000000000000000"
8. Paste the file that you copied into the folder and make sure to replace the old file with the new one
9. Launch SM and play!

NOTE: Some may suspect that this mod is a virus, but believe me, it's not, it just changes your character file which is a binary file

The character is customised to my in-game character, you can change it as long as you dont select anything from under the "Backpack" tab, if you select a backpack, you will not be able to remove it unless you reinstall this mod.
bc7932e1-bc7f-4595-865c-2d2f4d94a20e.name: No Backpack

fbe96826-cad2-4ebf-b87a-2b0ac54090d3.description:
SCI adds new features what the community wanted. Is the Antenna to big? Then SCI has the Compact Antenna. Bigger Resolution's (For Displays)? The 256x256 resolution display is here. No Syntax Libary? Wel SCI has it.

Scriptable Computers (Original): https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2821133117&searchtext=scriptable+computers

Lua Documentation (Official): https://www.lua.org/docs.html

Setup for Visual Studio Code.
1: Go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2891850490\VSCode. (Scrap Mechanic Workshop items location depends of where you installed scrap mechanic)

2: Add the sci.lua to your libary (If you have the lua extention installed).
3: Make a copy of template.lua, rename it. (Its fine to put it where it is)

And begin making Computers!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:
Donyti_Qramixy and TheFattestCat: These are the original owners of the original mod Scriptable Computers and the creations from the thumbnail. This mod would not exist without them making the original. Link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2821133117&searchtext=scriptable+computers

The Guild Of Scrap Mechanic Modders (Discord, The Red Builder): They helped me of trying to add json support for the Network Port even tho i did not tell them i was doing that.

GalaxyVOID (Discord): Helping me making the RAM Block thats unfortantly only for logic creations. (But can be used by the mod)
fbe96826-cad2-4ebf-b87a-2b0ac54090d3.name: SCI

66fe94fc-36d9-4f2f-a173-ce17ecb24c73.description:
Queensland Rail 2300 Class Diesel Locomotive intended for 7U track with smoke effects no mods

Livery:
Queensland Rail Corporate "Broncos"

Controls:
1 • Start Engine
2 • Go - hold (Engine must be on)
3 • High gear (off = low gear)

4 • Switch direction of travel
5 • Lights
6 • Horn
7 • Windscreen Wipers 


Trivia:
The 2300 class are a class of diesel locomotives rebuilt by Queensland Rail's Redbank Railway Workshops between 1997 and 2002. They are used mostly around Brisbane and southeastern Queensland train lines, although some have now travelled as far north as Townsville.

1550 class and 2400 class locomotives were rebuilt as 2300 classes with more powerful engines and were reclassified as 2300 classes. They now work typically on general freight traffic around Queensland, along with some passenger services. Some of these locos were used in the Bowen Basin prior to electrification.

By Jotrain Gamer
66fe94fc-36d9-4f2f-a173-ce17ecb24c73.name: QR 2300 Class Diesel Locomotive 7u

allows you to see zero width blocks

Zero width block, or zwb, is a block that are scaled down to have a width of 0 on any side. These blocks are heavily used in compact creations and allow for absolute no collision pass-throughs. These blocks can not be seen in game so this tool fixes that

do /toggleViewer to toggle zwbs

added compatability to the joint mod!.

505b6427-f350-42eb-b468-3bf7827d067f.description:
[h1]Introduction[/h1]
Impact is our first mod. It is motivitated by fun: not only for us, for you. Therefore you are welcome to tell us what feature you think is missing, should be changed or is bugged.

[h1]Content[/h1]
[h2]Homing Missiles[/h2]
The Rocket Launcher launches homing missiles that hunt your friends down!
You can change the target player in the GUI of the launcher.
Compete with your friends, to see who has the best creation.

[h2]Firework[/h2]
Yes, you heard it right. Impact adds fireworks to your game.
Firework is one of the core features of the Impact Mod. It can be launched from a creation or out of the players hand, making it easy to launch you, your friends and probably every other object into space. By the way, it also distracts homing rockets.

[h2]Lasers[/h2]
Impact not only adds shiny rockets, it also adds a Laser to Scrap Mechanic.
A friend's creation has beaten you yesterday, let's cut it in half. Got a biiiiig tomato but no knife, you guessed it, let's slice it with a laser.
All that is possible with the Impact mod.

[h2]String Logic - Number Logic but bigger![/h2]
There was digital logic in Scrap Mechanic, there was number logic in Scrap Mechanic and you think THIS IS NOT ENOUGH? Impact is your way to go: adding strings to your game! Build your own mini games, build servers communicating with you and your clients via chat or HUD...now there are no limitations! To get quick started in String Logic, check out [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2929567947]this guide[/url].

[h2]Advanced Game Rules[/h2]
At the time creating this mod, there is no way to hide the name tags. But that's no problem, we got you covered: you are searching for the Name Tag Jammer. It hides name tags when activated by a logic signal.

[h2]Turret Block[/h2]
Trying to create a laser that follows your friends automatically, aren't you? This block is what you are searching for. Simply connect two bearings, one on the horizontal axis and one on the vertical axis, to the turret block insert a target, activate it and there you go. It also supports other modes for advanced cases that involve Cameras and other stuff.

[h2]Number Logic Support[/h2]
A few parts in Impact require Number Logic. Therefore Impact provides primitive parts to satisfy this requirement, for advanced cases all Number Logic parts are compatible with The Modpack.

[h2]Other Features[/h2]
- Camera and Camera Controller
- Signal Transmitter
- Logic Configurator
- Number Screen
- Buoyancy Barrel (Variable Buoyancy)
- Screw Propeller
- Rocket Radar

[h1]Thank you![/h1]
Thank you for relying on the Impact mod.

Betas are tested and a lot of the ideas were made by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198380567070]Chris[/url].

Have fun, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198125147031]AK006[/url]
505b6427-f350-42eb-b468-3bf7827d067f.name: Impact

1d980de1-6326-43be-b847-dad138b4ac0d.description:
A tool that allows you to make dynamic cutscenes and export them as json.
HOW TO USE:
Hold left click to reset placed nodes
Right click to switch to playback mode
Press 'Q' to place a node
Press 'R' to save deployed nodes to $CONTENT_DATA/SavedCinematics/camera.json (If you have deployed nodes in the world)
Press 'R' to load saved nodes from $CONTENT_DATA/SavedCinematics/camera.json (If you don't have deployed nodes in the world)
1d980de1-6326-43be-b847-dad138b4ac0d.name: Spline Camera

f57271fc-c008-4f9f-9407-02d7d3eb2487.description:
This mod adds four types of "bacteria" to the game.
Each type has a unique behavior - for example, where one type simply eats away at a creation, another one sets it on fire!

Note: Use physics 1 for better performance

[h1]Bacteria Types[/h1]

[h2]Type 1 - Green Bacteria[/h2]
This type infects anything it touches, spreads throughout the creation and slowly eats away at it until there's nothing left.
To destroy or "fight" this bacteria, splash it with [b]Chemicals[/b] from a bucket or vacuum pump!

[h2]Type 2 - Red Bacteria[/h2]
This type behaves exactly the same as the green one - but if they combine...
This type can also be destroyed the same way as the green one.

[h2]Type 3 - Fire Bacteria[/h2]
This type looks and behaves similar to real fire (e.g. goes upwards faster than downwards).
Throw it in water or splash it with a bucket or water cannon to put out the fire!

[h2]Type 4 - Electric Bacteria[/h2]
This bacteria is charged with electricity and, upon being placed, generates a field of electric interference around it, which may disturb or even damage logic creations!
This bacteria spreads by randomly replacing a random block in a certain range with a relatively low chance.
If this bacteria comes in contact with water, its interference/infection radius becomes bigger.

[h1]Bacteria Sources[/h1]
Each of the 4 bacteria types also comes with a corresponding [b]Bacteria Source[/b]!
A Bacteria Source is a larger block of bacteria, which will behave similar to it's corresponding normal version, though with some slight differences - mainly, they have a much longer lifespan and do not multiply themselves (but still infect creations with normal bacteria).


Last but not least, there are:

[h2]Anti-Bacteria Blocks[/h2]
Protect your creations from unwanted infections!
This block will effectively shield anything you cover with it from bacteria infections.
f57271fc-c008-4f9f-9407-02d7d3eb2487.name: Bacteria Mod

a8001c69-7db7-477d-8649-9ccc31909c9e.description:
A mod that make trash finding a lot easier

-- WHAT IS IT DOING --

When you activate the unweld locator, it will automaticaly add beacons objects on every unwelded creations or parts in your world. Please note that the beacons will not be visible everytime because of the scrap mechanic render distance.

-- HOW TO USE --

Put the unweld locator on the floor
Shoot on it with a sputgun to activate / desactivate the beacons

WARNING : SHOOTING A BIG AMOUT OF POTATOS ON THE UNWELD LOCATOR AT THE SAME TIME WILL CRASH YOUR GAME

-- UPDATE PART 2 --

The mod as been updated : the beacons objects are now automaticaly deleting/adding/following the creation they are on and don't need actualisation anymore and they no longer fade out when out of range !

If you have any sugestions, let me know ^^
a8001c69-7db7-477d-8649-9ccc31909c9e.name: Custom Trash Locator Mod

55735746-8682-4fd8-a91e-f480241e984d.description:
This mod adds a placeable, fully functional ball joint!

A ball joint allows an attached part to swing and rotate freely in any direction.

Note that there are some limitations, as the implementation is not quite "official":

- The placed joint is invisible
- To erase the joint, you have to destroy the block it's attached to
- You cannot weld on the joint
- The joint might be "unstable" (aka cause crashes sometimes) as it's technically not an official implementation

d7e52690-92c7-413d-b6c3-140cd8177049.description:
[h1]The UNRAILED pack is here![/h1]

This pack was primarily made for Moonbo's Unrailed series that he live streamed a few times.
Here are some things that were included in the mod:
[list]
[*] Max friction pipes
[*] Creation Selector
[*] Creation Spawner
[*] Counter
[*] Count Display
[*] Tree and Rock nodes
[*] Map Builder
[*] Explosive launcher
[/list]

[h3]Max friction pipes[/h3]
Normal pipes with 10/10 friction

[h3]Creation Selector[/h3]
The Creation Selector is able to select any creation that is dynamic (not welded to the ground or on the lift) and is (at the moment), not able to handle bearings, pistons, etc. The creation will be ate in the process of selecting the creation when you interact with the selector. This is savable on the lift

[h3]Creation Spawner[/h3]
Connect a single Creation Selector into the Creation Spawner, and when the Creation Spawner is activated with logic, it will spawn the creation stored in the creation selector.

[h3]Counter[/h3]
The counter block is a block that simply counts up when connected resources are destroyed. A logic gate can be fed into the counter block, to reduce the count by one. It will not go below zero. Counters can be daisy chained, and it is recommended to only feed a logic block into the last counter in the chain to count down. For every tick the logic gate is active, it will count down 1.

[h3]Counter Display[/h3]
The counter block requires a special output to display the current count. Connect the counter to the counter display, and in the connected order, they will show the current count. The count is not in binary. From there, you can connect the counter displays to anything as a standard logic connection.

[h3]Tree and Rock nodes[/h3]
The tree and rock nodes are miniature resources with a custom logic output. They can only be connected to the counter block, and when destroyed, will increment the counter block.

[h3]Map Builder[/h3]
The map builder should can have up to 10 creation selectors fed into it, which are used as the available tiles for building your next map. It is recommended to use 13x13 tiles, and only use larger tiles when necessary. At any point you can exit the map builder, and manually edit the map, and return to the map builder. Be careful though, if you combine 2 tiles, they both will be deleted when you attempt to delete 1. There are on screen instructions you may follow once you are in the map builder. When you have finished building your map, it is recommended to combine tiles that are not in a square shape to square tiles by dragging blocks from one tile to the next. Then you may proceed with pressing the interact button when you are already inside of the map builder to glue the tiles together, and drop it down as a dynamic creation, savable on the lift.

[h3]Explosive launcher[/h3]
Goes kaboom when logic
d7e52690-92c7-413d-b6c3-140cd8177049.name: Unrailed Pack

2b9e7f4c-2ec2-4795-9468-188b0af0fdce.description:
Commands:
/fly - toggles fly
/gtime - advanced daylight system
/clean -  command removes small creation based on rating system (no way to config rating system yet)
/nick - manages nicknames on server
/gamerule - manages game rules

Subcommands:
/clean all - just clear but no need to allowclear
/clean far - cleans all creations in range above 90m*
/clean close - cleans all creations in range above 40m*
/clean trash - cleans all up to triple segments creations
/clean tt - cleans all single segment creations (like lost thrusters)
* - meters in game equals to 4 blocks

/nick show - shows all players nicknames
/nick show - hides all players nicknames

/gamerule explosives enable/disable/on/off - manages explosions
/gamerule sync on/off - experimental player sync option

Soon:
/smartclean - manages /clean command
/sc - shortcut to /smartclean
2b9e7f4c-2ec2-4795-9468-188b0af0fdce.name: More Access

3aeb81c2-71b9-45a1-9479-1f48f1e8ff21.description:
this fork of ScriptableComputer
fork creation was approved by the authors of the mod
for the mod to work correctly, there SHOULD BE NO "ScriptableComputer" and/or "SCI" in the world
this mod DOES NOT VIOLATE anyone's licenses, the author of the original does not mind that I am doing a fork
this mod DOES NOT CONTAIN SCI and ScrapComputers code and partial compatibility is implemented using a layer

[url=https://igorkll.github.io/SComputers] DOCUMENTATION [/url]
[url=https://discord.gg/uJrsmUjaMG] DISCORD SERVER [/url]

advantages of SComputers compared to any other computer mods:
[list]
  [*] bug fixes (critical filesystem bugs, bugs causing lags, bugs breaking code, and many other extremely unpleasant bugs have been fixed in SComputers)
  [*] compatibility (this mod is fully compatible with the original and with SCI and may also be compatible with other mods in the future)
  [*] responsive support (you can always write a comment to the mod and I will answer it, you can also write to me in the discord "smlogic")
  [*] optimization (displays in SComputers almost do not cause lags)
  [*] the presence of require and built-in libraries (image, midi, vdisplay, base64, utf8, ramfs, etc)
  [*] code examples (code examples in mod will help you figure it out a bit)
  [*] security (from SComputers it is much more difficult to cause bugsplat, game freezes, lags)
  [*] availability of new components
  [*] regular updates (about every month)
  [*] support for crafting recipes
  [*] radars are seen a robots/wocs/worms
  [*] ability to use betterAPI to load code
  [*] the mod has its own API for creating addons, which is described in the documentation
  [*] fast luaVM - FiOne_lua

b984a9d8-47c0-450f-825c-0403618e3f92.description:
Dear adventurer, let me tell you about the best Scrap Mechanic part that you never even knew you were missing out on. This part is a true game-changer, a marvel of engineering, and a must-have for any serious Scrap Mechanic enthusiast.

Imagine, if you will, a part that can transform your vehicles and contraptions from good to great, from functional to exceptional, from ordinary to extraordinary. A part that can unlock a whole new level of creativity and innovation, and help you take your Scrap Mechanic skills to the next level.

This part is so versatile, so adaptable, that it can be used in a myriad of different ways. It can enhance the speed and manoeuvrability of your vehicles, improve their durability and resilience, and even add new features and capabilities that you never thought possible.

This part is none other than the Crane Wheel™! You see, the Crane Wheel™ has become somewhat of a symbol for innovation and imagination in the world of scientific discovery. It represents the idea that anything is possible if you have the right tools and the right mindset. And that's exactly what this Scrap Mechanic mod does.

By adding the Crane Wheel™ to your Scrap Mechanic creations, you are embracing the spirit of creativity and pushing the boundaries of what is possible. You are harnessing the power of your imagination and using it to create amazing things that others can only dream of.

So, dear adventurer, I implore you to give this mod a try. You may be skeptical at first, but I assure you, once you see the incredible things you can do with the Crane Wheel™  you'll wonder how you ever lived without it. It truly is the best Scrap Mechanic part you didn't realise you were missing out on!

CONTAINS:
1x CRANE WHEEL™ in Creative

Be sure to like the workshop item if you found it life changing!


By Jotrain Gamer

7e9f0513-f6bf-4c40-b486-8b95e8389637.description:
Features
- More blocks for crafting inside the craftbot
- Stack size increase for previously unstackable items
- Changed some recipes to make more sense material wise
- Added Crafting recipe for component kits from 10 toteheads

With this mod, you can now unlock a treasure trove of brand-new recipes for a vast array of building blocks that were previously unavailable for crafting in survival. 
Whether you're a master builder or just getting started, this mod will take your crafting skills to the next level and elevate your game to new heights!

But wait, there's more! Unlike other mods that seek to balance gameplay by introducing recipes for circuits or component kits, this mod keeps it simple and focuses solely on providing you with more blocks to create with. So, you can enjoy the freedom to build without any restrictions or limitations, unleashing your creativity to the fullest.

I value your feedback, which is why we've left the door open for you to suggest your favorite blocks that are currently missing from the game. So, leave a comment and let me know what you'd like to see added to this mod!

Download it today and let your building dreams come to life!

Hope you enjoy building with the real wedges now ;)

I may also try to make the stacks for some of the blocks bigger, so items that were not stackable before like big pipe pieces could be stacked like the other pipe pieces.

Changed some recipies for balencing (Tubes)
Added Component Kit recipie out of 10 Totebot heads (to get rid of them, but not too OP)

I have implemented it for some of the blocks, feedback is welcome
7e9f0513-f6bf-4c40-b486-8b95e8389637.name: Craftbot Plus Inventory Improvements

     This tool allows you to teleport around the map just by looking at where you want to go.

     This tool Replaces your current Lift to have infinite reach, use [F] and [R] to extend lift past normal limits.
[*] [b]Admin Tool[/b]
     complex features, visit [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2022198450]this page[/url] for description.

     Allows you to people from your world.
[*] [b]World Cleaner[/b]
     Allows you to clear parts from the world.
[*] [b]Free Camera[/b]
     complex features, visit [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2022198450]this page[/url] for description.
[*] [b]Permission Manager[/b]
     Allows you to configure permission for other players to use.
[*] [b]Raw Block Editor[/b]
     Allows you to edit the raw data of a shape and update it in real time.
[*] [b]Stop Watch[/b]
     Track how fast you are with this stop watch timer, lmb-drag to create a line, rmb to delete line, force build to reset timer, Q to change lap-timer type.
[*] [b]Advanced X-O-Meter[/b]
     x-o meter from The Modpack, all credit goes to Brent Batch and the rest of The Modpack team.

c070161a-e8e0-4593-8e63-30799b7f6904.description:
[h1]This tool allows you to select multiple bodies and duplicate/mirror them[/h1]

[u][b]Update 04/09/2023[/b][/u][list]
[*]Added new parts from update 0.7.3
[*]Added support for draggable wedge mirroring[/list]

[u][b]Update 04/09/2023[/b][/u][list]
[*]Added support for the majority of survival parts and all challenge parts
[*]Recoloured the tool model, no longer uses default texture
[*]Added different text colours to the modes (blue for Select, green for Build) to better differentiate them at a glance
[*]Mirrored Build Mode is made more apparent by colouring the "M" in violet
[*]Simplified selection info, number of joints are no longer displayed
[*]The demo video is no longer 100% accurate because of this[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[u][b]Select Mode[/b][/u][list]
[*]Left click (default for Build/Primary) to select a body
[*]Right click (default for Remove/Secondary) to deselect a body
[*]F (default for Force Build) to cycle save slots
[*]Hold F (default for Force Build) to save selected bodies to current slot
[*]R (default for Reload) to switch to Build Mode
[*]Double clicking selects/deselects a body and its immediate child bodies (the body on which you first place a joint is the parent, and anything you build on the other end of the joint is the child)
[*]Triple clicking selects/deselects a body and all its descendant bodies[/list]

[u][b]Build Mode[/b][/u][list]
[*]Left click (default for Build/Primary) to spawn saved bodies of the current slot
[*]Q (default for Next Rotation) to rotate/mirror creation (a violet "M" is displayed to indicate mirrored build mode)
[*]F (default for Force Build) to cycle save slots
[*]R (default for Reload) to switch to Select Mode[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[u][b]Notes[/b][/u][olist]
[*]The save slot number (1-3) is shown in square brackets [ ] before the tool mode
[*]The number of selected bodies is shown after the tool mode
[*]An asterisk (*) will appear at the end of the number of selected bodies if the selection is disjointed (one or more bodies are not connected to the others)
[*]If every body of a creation has been selected, the number of selected bodies will be enclosed in brackets ( )
[*]Selecting a body will select all joints that it is the parent of
[*]Interactable settings are preserved in the copies and bearing directions are reversed when mirrored
[*]Only works for creative mode parts, challenge mode parts, and majority of survival mode parts
[*]Shift+Q (rotating/mirroring in reverse order) does not yet work (broken SM API feature)
[*]There are no collision checks (yet, maybe) when spawning creations, be prepared for a bad time if you spawn into other objects
[*]Unpredictable outcomes may occur if a creation is modified while selecting or saving[/olist]

6defd250-22f3-4731-9b22-377666398a6b.description:
Logic Driven Explosives that create an explosion when recieving an "on" signal. They can be used for engines, rockets, pyrotechnics, and for competitive vehicle games due to their instantaneous explosion >:)

There are three varieties: "typical," "lethal," and "safe." Lethal is just as strong as the typical explosion, while safe only destroys blocks like cardboard. Typical explosives do destroy themselves, which is just so... typical of them.

This is my first mod, I hope it brings an element of fun into your game. I suggest turning off Camera Shake if you connect one of these to a loop... things get a bit chaotic ;)
6defd250-22f3-4731-9b22-377666398a6b.name: Logic Explosive

d00ce8bf-cb44-4174-b64b-0267aafc5891.description:
Эта модификация - всего лишь весточка о том, что я не забыл о вас.
Давно не слышались, друзья.
Уже прошло очень много времени с того момента, как игра обновилась и в моих модах сломалось большинство моделек и скриптов.
Я не пропал, постепенно приводил все впорядок, понимая, что пульс игры постепенно ослабевает, а к моим модификацпиям никогда небыло огромного спроса из-за их топорности или ненужности и старым модам чисто системно уже не вернуться снова в топ.
Но я все исправил, в старых модах я изменил все модельки, которые мне не нравились через призму времени, ведь в то время я смотря на пару полигонов и кричал "Вау, это превосходно" , часть предметов безвозвратно удалил за их ненадобностью или альтернативным превосходством других модификаций.
Мне было бы бесконечно приятно, если бы настоящие олдфаги обратили внимание снова. Я реально постарался, делал изменения исходя из того, что было бы неправильно похоронить их, вместо того чтобы все исправить.
Если у вас будут какие либо предложения, которые я никогда не упускал из внимания в былое время, обязательно пишите их к тому моду, в который вы хотели бы внести изменения или что то добавить.
В этой модификации для вас небольшой, но душевный подарочек.
В комментариях под этим модом вы можете написать о том, кто тут главный распи3дяй в здании, мне будет приятно :)

This mod is just a message that I have not forgotten about you.
Haven't see you for a long time, friends.
It's been a very long time since the game was updated and most of the models and scripts broke in my mods.
I did not disappear, I gradually put everything in order, realizing that the pulse of the game was gradually weakening, and there was never a huge demand for my modifiers because of their clumsiness or uselessness and the old mods would not return to the top again purely systemically.
But I fixed everything, in the old mods I changed all the models that I didn't like through the prism of time, because at that time I was looking at a couple of polygons and shouting "Wow, this is excellent", some of
d00ce8bf-cb44-4174-b64b-0267aafc5891.name: [FR13] WE NEED TO TALK

5c31e4b1-2095-4ec6-9e0b-90d3e8a76ec7.description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
original: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2821133117
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

this mod just changes a few lines of code and adds a few blocks. other than that, this is a copy of the mod above. if you want to use this, then remember that all of the credit goes to the original creators: TheFattestCat and Donyti_Qramixy

whats new/different:
-radars do not have noise (no errors in readings, no randomness in readings)
-added flares and a flare dispenser (red flare just disappears after some time, blue flare fools the radar into thinking it is the same body it was launched from)
-added more powerful small radars
-added a transparent display (easily breakable) (most of the work for this was already done by TheFattestCat and Donyti_Qramixy)
-added a setVAngle() and a getVAngle(). these functions refer to the vertical angle (as in pitch) that the radar is rotated to.
-added a RWR block (outputs a signal if it is detected by radars)

i have tried making an add-on, but i failed

if the original authors of the mod disapprove of this, please just comment on this. ill delete it and ill try again to make the add-on.

i have seen a discussion on the original mod page about making a fork, so i thought that maybe this could also kinda apply to me. i've also started a discussion about making an add-on, but i didnt get an answer, so i deleted it after some time.
5c31e4b1-2095-4ec6-9e0b-90d3e8a76ec7.name: ScriptableComputer but with better tools

54c88924-cba6-43a7-be21-973c6727d8ad.description:
[h1]Easier Survival - Enhanced Game Mode[/h1]

Tired of the grind? This custom game mode tweaks survival to make things smoother and more rewarding, so you can focus on building and exploring!

[h2]How It Works:[/h2]
• When you are in the main menu press Custom Game mode on the top right Corner and then select this mod and create a new world.

[h2]Player Enhancements:[/h2]• Faster Hand Refining time.
• Double Stack Sizes.

[h2]Crafting Improvements:[/h2]• Craftbot now crafts faster.
• New recipe for Component Kits and Circuit Boards.
• Totebot Heads can be converted into Multiple Circuit Boards.
• Refinery Yields 50% Extra than Normal Hand Refined Amount.

[h2]Loot Boosts:[/h2]• Oil: x5-10 per collectable.
• Clams: x3 per collectable.
• Flowers: x5 per collectable.
• Beeswax: x4 per collectable.
• Cotton: x5 per collectable.
• Corn: x3 per collectable.
• Refining items now grants 40 blocks.

[h2]Farming Changes:[/h2]• Crops Give Double The Amount When Harvested.


[h3]Enjoy![/h3]
54c88924-cba6-43a7-be21-973c6727d8ad.name: Survival Tweaks

0e903652-d674-416c-91f7-effa1fcd4cae.description:
unfortunately, the author will no longer develop this mod, he left the game for unknown reasons ...
although he was very talented and promising.
this is DLM version 2.7 (the last one I have).
I decided that I would take over the development, the
original DLM will always lie in this mod, but in the "content" folder there will be a DLM with my changes described in the file "listOfChanges.txt ". at the same time.
I undertake to maintain security and fix any vulnerabilities that have arisen

the documentation is located in the docs folder in the mod files

new apis (listOfChanges):
added coroutine: dlm.coroutine
added debug.traceback: dlm.debug.traceback
added file importer: dlm.io.readFile():content -- the path is chosen by the user
added file exporter: dlm.io.writeFile(content):ok, err -- the path is chosen by the user

installation:
-- 1
* goto mod files
* goto folder "content/files"
* copy all the replacement files to the release folder of the game

-- 2
* goto mod files

0b13c513-c64e-411c-af7a-56a5b4c06989.description:
Niko - Polskie Semafory i Wskaźniki Kolejowe [v2]



Witam! Znalazłeś się na stronie jednej z paru moich modyfikacji! Przed zasubskrybowaniem zalecam przeczytać poniższy opis:

Modyfikacja "Niko - Polskie Semafory i Wskazniki Kolejowe [v2]" to modyfikacja, która dodaje polskie semafory i wskaźniki do gry Scrap Mechanic. Modyfikacja w pełni zastępuje dotychczasową modyfikację "Niko - Semafory i Wskazniki".

Modyfikacja zawiera około 500 elementów, z których można zbudować polskie semafory oraz wskaźniki. Obecnie w modyfikacji znajdują się semafory produkcji ERICSSON (LME), KOMBUD (KBD), ZWUS (ZWS), ADTRANZ (ADT), BOMBARDIER (BBD), THALES (THA). Modyfikacja zawiera dużą ilość elementów interaktywnych więc zaleca się czytać opisy poszczególnych elementów.

=====================================================
Serwer Discord Niko: >>> https://discord.gg/zAc8QXawZ8 <<<
=====================================================

FAQ:
Q: Jak zbudować semafor?
A: Najlepiej użyć wbudowanego narzędzia "Semafor spawner tool". Klikając LPM z narzędziem w ręce otwiera się menu z wyborem semaforów, z którego można stawiać gotowe semafory.

Q: Jak zmienić kolor światła semafora?
A: Należy pomalować daną komorę semafora na odpowiedni kolor.

3b9e4bc6-ae0c-4dc2-a0e6-12ea77e78af5.description:
An interactable mug who is determined to stay upright!

You can connect a logic signal to turn it on or off, or just leave it at its default of being on.
While on, the mug will try to sit upright. Attatch it to your vehicles to be able to keep them upright all the time.

While Suspension Glitch is great at stabilizing, there are four seperate reasons why the StabiliZING Mug is simply the superior option.

1. The StabiliZING Mug will always try to point upwards, while a suspension glitch setup will slowly veer from perfect alignment.
2. The StabiliZING Mug can be customized in stiffness. A suspension glitch is essentially perfectly stiff, with no way to make it feel more natural.
3. It is easy to keep it compact. The smallest a suspension glitch can get is 2x1x1, and that's only if you use glitchwelding.
4. It can be turned on and off with nothing more than a logic signal. You don't need to have any kinematics to restrict the suspension glitch.

There is bonus mug included titled the Slowing Mug. It has a feature that suspension glitch can not replicate, which is to slow down in midair. It is great for giving flying machines tighter controls.

I've made a few vehicles to showcase all of the possible ways you could use this tech, and might make a few more. Here is the collection:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3010223930

This mod uses coding inspirations from "Hoverpads" by 00Fant. I was trying to figure out how everything in Scrap Mechanic Modding worked, and there were some questions that weren't answered by the Scrap Mechanic Lua API Reference.
3b9e4bc6-ae0c-4dc2-a0e6-12ea77e78af5.name: StabiliZING Mug

8dce5730-a409-4340-9c0e-210109460136.description:
This Mod Add from my Main Fant Mod the Unit Facer, Unit Facer HUB and the Waypoint Marker Tool as Standalone Part. 
This Blocks allows you to Build Auto Aiming Turrets, Mouse Controlled Aiming things like Mouse Aim Turrets or Vehicles that turn based on your View Direction. and much more.
Not all Modes are supported in this version, but Most of them. 
To get the Full Functionality of all modes use the Fant Mod.

Here the COLOR Code List of all Supported Modes:

DEFAULT Color = Only Robots
WHITE Color = All Units
BLUE Color = Wocs and Glowbugs
RED Color = Players
YELLOW Color = All Except Players!
BLACK Color = Other Players and not the Player Owner
PURPLE Color = Aim at the Owner Aim Direction
PINK Color = Aim at the Owner Aim Position
LIGHTORANGE = Aim at Rocks
LIGHTYELLOW = Aim at Trees
LIGHTGREEN = Aim at Refine Rods
LIGHTGRAY = Waypoint Follow

( i hope i dont have to explain that the First Row of colors in the Paint tool are LIGHT Colors and not the Colors for the Unit Facer Modes! 
So when there is written "RED" then it Means RED and not Light or Dark Red!!! )

758be396-082c-423e-bf81-498ce08bc847.description:
This Mod add a Logic Block that Allows you to Copy and Spawn Creations with Logic Triggering.
To Copy a Creation, bring the Logic Creation Spawner Close to the Creation you want to Copy 
and Press (E) On the Logic Creation Spawner.
Connect a Button or any Logic (!Default Color!) to the Logic Creation Spawner.
If you Trigger the Input it will Spawn the Creation.
If you connect a Button (Logic) (Any Other Color then Default!) to it, it will Copy the Creation Infront of it.

Be Careful to not Spam your world full with Creations!

Plant tree seeds and corn seeds just like other seeds, with water and eventually fertilizer. You won't see the soil crop after you plant a tree but you can still use water and fertilizer.

a4063cc2-d4d9-492f-987a-0c9e7810c3cf.description:
[h1]This is a Full Survival Sky World. [/h1]
No Ground!
If you know "Sky Block" from Minecraft then you will understand what this Gamemode is.
You Build and Survive in the Sky without Ground. 
Manage to get from Island to Island to gather Materials
All Resources that you need can Spawn on the Floating Islands around you.
Every Island has Different things on it, from Resources to Robots and such.
I wanted to keep it as close as possible to the "Normal" Survival mode with the requied tweaks
to make it into a Sky Mechanic gamemode.

Try to Survive, Expand from Island to Island, try to get all Weapons and gear and whatelse you want =)

Enjoy and Have Fun!

Known Issue:
sometimes the Trader Button disconnects, in that case just reload the map and it will be connected again.

in case it gets a bit laggy, try with "/cheat" on the command "/killall" to clear all robots from the world

in case you dont teleport back to the trader island, try "/die"


Features:
- Custom Trader with Custom Trades fit for the Sky
- Packing Crates and Vacuum them
- Farming on the Floating Islands
- Raids on the Floating Islands
- Clouds
- Adjusted recipe for the Craftbot and Trader
- "/cheat" command to enable cheats
- "/fly" command to fly around when cheats are active
- Custom Recipeloader Craftbot Included
- you can add nearly any Block and Part mods ( if they have recipes the craftbot will see them )

[h1] Modded Challenge Mode (Custom Game)[/h1]

[h3]Feedback[/h3]
Community feedback is highly valued and needed for the continued improvement of this mod. Please leave any and all information regarding your experience, problems, etc. in the comments below, add me on discord (TheGuy920) or join my [url=https://discord.gg/FQg62dq]discord server[/url]

[h3]WARNING:[/h3]
Any changes made in build mode will not save (for the time being) until an optimal solution has been chosen

[h3]Currently Working Features[/h3]
[list]
[*] Load and play challenges from the workshop ([i]challenges uploaded before 8/1/23[/i])
[*] Working challenge logic and progression
[*] Multiplayer well supported
[*] Normal working challenge mode
[*] Mods supported
[*] Working Menu Book
[*] Health and respawn
[*] Level selector for challenge packs
[*] Open challenges in build mode
[*] Test and Stop Test implemented
[*] Scrolling on all menu pages
[*] Build mode works as expected ([b]SAVING DOES NOT WORK[/b])
[/list]

[h3]Planned Features[/h3]
[list]
[*] [b]Save changes in build mode[/b]
[*] Integrated "hide and seek" mod
[*] Integration with ChallengeDatabase ([i]coming soon[/i])
[*] Size can be reduced by 600MB
[*] [i]Create Challenges[/i] 
[list] [*] Likely will need to be done in normal challenge mode, before continuing in the custom game [/list]
[/list]

[h3]Known Bugs[/h3]
[list]
[*] [strike]After leaving build world, incorrect world management when joining non-build world[/strike]
[*] [strike]After joining world with health, health bar is still active[/strike]
[*] [strike]Health bar does not show up for clients on first world join[/strike]
[*] [strike]When a client joins while the level has been loaded, they will join the lobby world and not the challenge world[/strike]
[*] [strike]Clients have visible health, although its only a visual glitch[/strike]
[*] [strike]Menu Book ...[/strike]
[*] [strike]Unexplained mega death sound after blowing up entire map[/strike]
[*] [strike]Unverified instances of extreme lag and stuttering[/strike]
[/list]

[i]Sorry about the 1GB size. Working on reducing it but the game doesn't like to behave nicely[/i]
bebb9da7-8fec-4195-ba24-2d0c8fd9977a.name: Modded Challenge Mode

038b823d-9a78-46cc-a6c2-269522bfe71b.description:
This mod adds various technologic objets developed by the SuEjon Military factory (That its just fiction lol dont take it seriously) by his main designer, Ejon. You can find stuff from fuel transferer devices to high range radar sensors.

Features:
-Long distance Radar Sensor (One for objects and other for terrain)
-Aircraft externals dettacher (Small and Big version)
-3x3 Ramjet thruster
-Modular pieces for creating missiles and rockets.
-Fuel Transfer Device
-RWR (radar detector)

Ways of using:

-- Radar sensor: Its like a normal sensor, but simpler. It detects wether objects or terrain at a huge distance, depending on what version of the radar you choose,

-- External Dettacher: This part will destroy itself when recieved a logic input. The way its meant to use its to put it under your plane's wing and under the attacher; a bomb, missile, rocket or anything that you would like to drop.

-- 3x3 Ramjet thruster: Like a normal thruster, but it has fixed power. The fuel usage is twice the normal level 5 thruster at maximum power, recomended for vehicles wich are odd in width where you can't put a normal thruster centered.

-- Fuel Transferer: It can be connected up to 3 things. 2 SM fuel tanks and a logic INPUT wich will trigger the fuel transfer. The fuel flow will be FROM the tank you connected first TO the other one. You can't connect 3 tanks to the device (you can but it wont do anything)

-- RWR System: Its a simple device with an integrated screen. It will show up different icons depending on what kind of thread you have against your vehicle. There are 2 icons: The diamond with a dot means that a tracking nose has targetted you, that icon can be shown at the top, left, bottom or right of the screen, so you know where it comes from. If a danger icon starts blinking, it means that the tracking nose was fired against you. For each time the warning appears, the device emmits a logic signal, so you can connect it to a totebot head or some sound part. For last, there is the radar icon, wich means a radar is detecting your vehicle. For turning on the RWR, connect it to a button or something and turn it on.

-- Modular ballistic parts:
-> Explosive mass: Its the body of your projectile, it explodes if it detects high acceleration and sometimes when it collides.

-> Nose: Its for the front of your projectile (its explosive)

-> Tail: Its for the back of your projectile (also explosive)

-> Thruster: The thruster has its own fuel inside, its one use. 15 seconds of burn time (The attachable version has less power)

-> Tracking nose: It can be connected to 3 things. A ballistic thruster, a button or another activation system, and a light or another thing that can be toggled. When the nose RECIEVES logic INPUT, it will start tracking in a vision cone of 15°. Once it got a target, it will lock it forever, even if you turn off the button. While a target its locked, the nose will SEND logic OUTPUT. If the nose detects that its connected to a ballistic thruster, its burning AND it has a target locked, the nose will start trying to go to the target. If it gets close enought, it will detonate by itself.

disclaimer: The plane in the pictures is only illustrative, it includes other parts wich don't come with this mod, like the wings (I will upload it soon if you want it)
disclaimer 2: All this ballistics things are in beta, Im struggling a lot to make it work fine but its really hard. So expect it not to work. Srry ;_;
disclaimer 3: This is my first public mod, I know its not the best stuff you have ever seen, it has lots of bugs


Extra recommendations: For adding aerodynamics to the projectiles, I recommend the mod "wings" wich you may already know. The way I found the best in aerodynamics its to place 4 small wings around the front and the back of the missile without any angle, Il be uploading a missile soon so you will have an example. Without wings, its too hard to get a missile working properly.
038b823d-9a78-46cc-a6c2-269522bfe71b.name: SuEjon Technologic Components

# Better Placement
A collection of building-related tools.
## BetterPlacementTool
### How to use
1. Hold the Better Placement Tool, press R to turn it on.
2. Hold the part you want to place, look where you want to place it
3. Select the Rotation Axis by looking at different parts of the gizmo, Press Q (rotation key) to Rotate.
  Press R (reload key) to lock the gizmo to that spot.
4. Press and hold (For the Click & Drag setting) or Press {For the Click Twice setting) the primary mouse button for the positioning gizmo to show up.
5. Move the part visualization to your desired spot by moving the cursor and pressing Q to use the vertical axis
6. Release the primary mouse button (For the Click & Drag setting) or click it again (For the Click Twice setting)
### Settings
- Hold the Better Placement Tool, press Q (rotation key)
### Notes
- If you start the placement on a body (e.g. a frame) and move it over to another body (e.g. a wheel), the part will still attach to the first body (the frame).
- If you build the part so that it isn't attached to the original body, it will disconnect when the body is put on a lift.
- As of now, the mod only supports placing parts on parts/blocks/terrain.
### Credits
Tweakeroo's Flexible Block Placement (concept)

## SelectionTool
### How to use
1. Look at the block you want to manipulate
2. Use the primary mouse button to 'lock' the selection
3. Press and hold F (force build key) to open the pie menu
4. Select the wanted action, release F
5. Follow instructions

### Settings
TBD


!!! This mod almost certainly doesn't work in multiplayer !!!

ee7f6b44-e9e8-4636-89ce-e7f5fd41c070.description:
[h1][b]Challenge Mode in Creative? YES![/b][/h1]

[h1] READ THIS FIRST [/h1]
[h3][b]This is exactly like challenge mode and supports mods! You can play, build, create and UPLOAD your modded challenges and it works perfectly in multiplayer. Don’t let the long instructions below scare you. It’s a simple 1 click install![/b][/h3]

[h2][b]Make sure you download the required items!![/b][/h2]

[h3] Why do I want this? [/h3]
Because it supports all "normal" creative mods for challenges ("normal" because this creative mod is not normal)! It also supports kinematics, harvestables, custom worlds/tiles, nodes, etc. This means you can create challenges with mods and upload them to the workshop and then users can load the modded challenges using this mod

[h3] Update: [/h3]
There is a chest problem. Some items don’t load in chests.

[h3] How does it work? [/h3]
Well first, this is not a custom game, but a creative mode mod! It allows for playing and editing challenges (including local challenges), in the normal creative mode, and since creative mode supports mods, this does too! 

The local and “global” challenge editing relies on a local detector to detect your local challenge packs and challenge levels as well as a Challenge Pack Database mod.

[h3]Feedback[/h3]
Community feedback is highly valued and needed for the continued improvement of this mod. Please leave any and all information regarding your experience, problems, etc.

[h3] Discord [/h3]
Join the discord: https://discord.gg/YH9EdZR87F
[img=https://i.imgur.com/Zh9ImwA.gif]

[h3] Whats planned for the future? [/h3]
I plan on adding a direct API for mod makers and will look into making an exe or powershell script that can edit the scrap mechanic exe to allow for the challenge mode skybox in creative mode and allow for challenge time synchronization

[hr]

[h3] How do I make a new challenge? [/h3]
There is a bit of technical work to be done, so make sure you follow the directions below or watch the YouTube tutorial (if posted or available)
[list]
[*] This mod cannot make new challenge packs or levels. This must be done in challenge mode

[*] In the near future, it may be possible to add new levels to existing challenge packs

[*] When making a new level, you will need to click build, you should also take this time to add a challenge starter and complete the challenge. If you do not do this, you will not be able to upload to the workshop later

[*] At this point you should have a new challenge with a completion time, making it ready to upload

[*] There is a local "detector". This detector can detect local levels and packs you make. 

[*] When you make a new level, it creates that level in its own folder: [b][i]level_id/data[/i][/b]

[*] When you add that level to a challenge pack, it copies the level, in the challenge pack folder: [b][i]challenge_id/level_id/data[/i][/b]

[*] When the game goes to load that level now, it will load [b][i]challenge_id/level_id/data[/i][/b] instead of [b][i]level_id/data[/i][/b]

[*] The local detector can detect the ID of either the pack or the level, however you must have loaded into the level for this to occur. When you previously created a new challenge and completed it, it added the [b][i]level_id[/i][/b] to a local list. However you added it to a challenge pack and the local detector has not been able to run, and detect the challenge pack id. So for 1 final time, you must load into the level [b][IN PLAY MODE, NOT BUILD MODE][/b], and then the game will load [b][i]challenge_id/level_id/data[/i][/b] allowing the detector to get the level and the pack ID. 

[*] Without the pack id and ONLY the level ID, you will be editing [b][i]level_id/data[/i][/b] in the mod instead of [b][i]challenge_id/level_id/data[/i][/b]. So if you were to upload, you will not see any changes. 

[*] Now for the easy part. You can load up the mod, and begin editing (and saving!) the challenge levels. From this point forward, if you add mods to your level, you are NOT to load the challenge pack or any levels in the normal Challenge Mode! Your game will be really sad if you do. If you simply want to build challenges, with temporary mods, like helpful building tools, you are more than welcome to load the challenge back into the normal Challenge Mode.

[*] When you want to update or upload, simply navigate back to the normal challenge mode, and click update or upload for the challenge pack!
[/list]
Lastly be sure to update the workshop item with the correct list of mod dependencies and customize the icon, as it will not update after the first completion time (if you use mods and cannot load it in normal challenge mode again).
ee7f6b44-e9e8-4636-89ce-e7f5fd41c070.name: Challenge Mode in Creative

7a9df191-d013-4ad9-8efe-141141886e5d.description:
[h1]Amplified Mountains: Elevate Your World[/h1]

[b]One Sentence Description:[/b]
Discover the exhilaration of towering landscapes with Amplified Mountains, a custom game mod meticulously crafted to transform hills into challenging peaks, offering not only a visually striking experience but also a more rigorous terrain for testing vehicles and strategies.

[b]Detailed Description:[/b]
Amplified Mountains goes beyond mere visual enhancement—it’s a conduit to elevated challenges and testing grounds. By morphing the rolling hills into jagged, towering mountains, it introduces a layer of complexity and ruggedness to the game’s terrain, offering players a uniquely challenging environment to test the mettle of their vehicles. Navigate through the intricate landscapes, assess your strategies against the imposing heights, and push your vehicles to their limits in this reshaped, more demanding world. Whether you're an innovation enthusiast keen on testing creations or a strategist eager for new environmental challenges, Amplified Mountains ensures a richer, more intricate gaming experience.

[b]Tags:[/b]
Amplified Mountains, Custom Game, Mod, Challenging Terrain, Vehicle Testing, Hills, Mountains, Transformation, Strategic, Visual Enhancement, Elevated, Rugged, Complexity, Intricate Landscapes, Demanding

4adfeff8-43c0-42e6-8517-7b2e116e2bbb.description:
Modification générale du jeu pour une expérience orientée construction. Moins de grind, plus de ressources. Les fichiers du mod SMOOTH SURVIVAL on ete repris et modifier Merci au créateur de ce mod, si vous voulez le soutenir n'hésitez pas à aller sur la page de son mod.

IMPORTANT :
Avant toute chose, pour éviter des problèmes causés par d'anciens mods que vous auriez installé, il est fortement conseillé de vérifier l'intégrité des fichiers en cliquant avec le bouton droit sur votre jeu dans la bibliothèque steam, en cliquant ensuite sur "Propriétés" > "Fichiers locaux" > "Vérifier l'intégrité des fichiers"

Pour installer :
- Allez dans "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990" il est généralement présent sur le disque OS (C:), si il n'y est pas, c'est que vous
l'avez sûrement installer dans un autre disque de stockage, pour plus de facilité faites clic-droit sur votre jeu dans votre bibliothèque steam et aller dans Propriétés...
Allez dans l'onglet Fichiers locaux puis dans Parcourir les fichiers locaux...
Remontez de deux pages en arrière dans le dossier et allez dans workshop\content\387990.
- Faites clic-droit dans un endroit vide du dossier et cliquez sur "Trier par > Modifié le" refaites de même et cliquez sur "Trier par > Ordre décroissant" il devrait y avoir un dossier appelé "3045894383" en premier, allez dedans et ouvrez l'image "preview" si c'est la miniature du mod c'est que vous êtes au bon endroit.
- Allez dans le dossier "Scrap Mechanic" et copiez le dossier "Data" et "Survival" puis collez-les dans le dossier "Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic" (remmontez de 5 pages en arrière dans le dossier et vous verrez le dossier "common") et cliquez sur remplacer. Vous avez fini l'installation !

/!\ Pour désinstaller, il vous suffit d'aller dans les propriétés de votre jeu, dans fichiers locaux et de cliquez sur vérifier l'intégrité des fichiers locaux.
Aussi, il faudra réinstaller le mod à chaques mises à jour du jeu... /!\

Liste des changements :
-Temps de craft réduits
-Augm
4adfeff8-43c0-42e6-8517-7b2e116e2bbb.name: Chill Survival

2022-10-13

Because I've just removed and changed some code so idk if its sure or not but It should be !
If you don't know where saves are stored go to the installation section

[code]I did not tried everything ,but this should work :
[list]
[*] RecycleBot
[*] Hideout new trading
[*] Higher item stacking
[*] Items with no icons
[*] Textures not loading
[*] Time in the Handbook not working
[*] Warehouse elevator stuck
[*] Vacuum pipes T and Cross
[*] Scrap light
[*] Multiplayer
[/list]
NOT WORKING :
[list]
[*] Nothing I think !
[/list]
[b]Just tell me in the comments if something is not working, I will check what I can do, but I'm not promising anything.[/b][/code]

[hr][/hr]

[b]This is a survival mod. [/b]

Groupix05 Mods Discord server if you are interested: [b]https://discord.gg/S69xrGCQeS[/b]
I have Craftbot+ Patched and Minecraft modpacks if you need help or if you have suggestion or just wanting to chat.

[h1]What does this mod do?[/h1]
This mod mainly adds a ton of crafting recipes together with a few extra features. You get a recyclebot, new vacuum pipes (T and cross-pipes), new trades at the trader and increased stack sizes.

If you want an exact number, you get 244 extra recipes in the craftbot and 82 in the recyclebot. (These numbers are probably out of date at this point)

[h1]Installation[/h1]
This is a file mod, it has to be manually installed. Will be made as a Block and Part mod in the future ,so its compatible with a lot more things.

[u][b]Before using it ,make a backup of your save file, you should be able to find them in[/b][/u]
[code]%Appdata%\Axolot Games\Scrap Mechanic\User\User_<Some numbers>\Save\Survival[/code]

Then open your Scrap mechanic folder :
[code]steam library > right clicking on Scrap Mechanic > Properties > Local files > Browse[/code]

And Open in another file explorer the mod, 
[code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\3051604594\[/code]

Then copy "Data" and "Survival" folders from the mod into the scrap mechanic folder and click overwrite all.

Now you should be good to go! Enjoy your not-at-all-unnecessary-amount-of-crafting-recipes.

[h1] Updating [/h1]

You need to [b]verify the integrity of the game[/b] before updating the mod !
Then you can just do the same thing as the installation.

PLEASE DO BACKUPS BEFORE UPDATING

[h1]Compatibility[/h1]

Every file for compatibility as been removed .I will check compatibility once the Block and Part mod is done.

This mod will only work if its alone ,or if the second mod dont change anything in the crafter.

I will check for a compatibility between this mod and 00Fant mod, but I need to understand how I can do that.

[h1]Multiplayer[/h1]
If you want to play multiplayer, any people trying to join need to have the exact same file mods installed. If you get a checksum error on join, the files aren't identical.

[h1]Other[/h1]
If you have an idea for a new recipe or feature or find any bugs, let me know by leaving a comment.
Finally, if you think this mod was crap, leave a thumbs down. If you liked it, leave a thumbs up.
If you do leave a thumbs down, any ideas on how to make improvements would be greatly appreciated.

Crafbot+ logo download (for whatever reason): https://i.imgur.com/RZWNrV1.png

[h3] Special Thanks[/h3]
Thanks to the original mod creator : [b]WaspEyeNight[/b]

And thanks to [b]00Fant[/b] for issues with some files, and his amazing mods he made. His mods helps me a lot to understand how to mod this game, so thanks a lot 00Fant !

[h3]What you may and may not do with the mod files[/h3]
Check the original mod description for more detail, this mod is not mine and everything is done by WaspEyeNight and Axolot

090bc798-aca2-44e6-b57c-76c0a6986e32.description:
[i][h1]Cannons Pack Realistic.[/h1]

[hr][/hr]
[b]Videos in Russian about this mod:(u can use subtitles)[/b]

https://youtu.be/3U-BDA4Cpbo
https://youtu.be/h25sNP1Jy_A

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Developers:[/h2]
[b]Scripts:[/b]
[u]Heterty[/u](Ricochets, Penetrations, Shrapnels, all other additions)
[u]Questionable Mark[/u](Base for mod, original CP dev.)

[b]Other:[/b]
[u]Driver[/u](Polish localisation)

3d models of shrapnels was taken from the Machine Gun Pack(MGP).

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Info:[/h2]
[code]Min. projectile force to ricochet - 50 m/s(don't forget about shell’s speed loss)[/code]

[h3]Value parameters:[/h3]
[b]"Ricochet Chance 0.0 - 1.0"[/b]
[code]Chance of a ricochet, 0 - impossible, 1 - always[/code]
[b]"Ricochet Angle  0.0 - 90.0 (deg)"[/b]
[code]Angle for ricochet, 0 - no ricochet, 89.9 - in almost any situation, and 10, for example, only at a strong tilt[/code]

[b]"Normalization 0.0 - 30.0 (deg)"[/b]
[code]Turn towards the armor in degrees[/code]
[b]"Max. Penetration (blocks)"[/b]
[code]Maximum penetration in blocks[/code]
[b]"Explosion Power (Modern sys.)"[/b]
[code]When turning on the armor penetration loss with a distance, this value is multiplied by the distance traveled from 0 to 1. When turning on the armor penetration loss with an angle, the strength level of the block increases depending on how large the angle is. Eventually, the strength of the block decreases from this value. And then, when calculating whether there will be a breakthrough or not, the formula current value / starting value * explosion level is used.
Example: Falling with distance and angle is disabled. Value = 10. Explosion Level = 5. When the tree block is broken, the value will become 7.
The Explosion Level will become 7 / 10 * 5 = 3.5[/code]
[b]"Ignore less than (x) qual. lvl."[/b]
[code]When hitting a quality level below and including the value, the penetration will not decrease and a ricochet will not occur.[/code]

[b]"Expl.Lvl. Lose Dist. Start (m)"[/b]
[code]Start of the distance from which the explosion power decreases[/code]
[b]"Expl.Lvl. Lose Dist. End (m)"[/b]
[code]The end of the distance from which the explosion power decreases[/code]
[b]"Expl.Lvl. Lose Angle Value"[/b]
[code]A value that controls how much the angle will affect the power of the explosion[/code]

[b]"F. Explosion level"[/b]
[code]The level of an explosion after shell despawns[/code]
[b]"F. Explosion radius"[/b]
[code]The radius of an explosion after shell despawns[/code]

[b]"Shrapnel Type"[/b]
[code]Shrapnel Type
F. - Shrapnels that are created after the final explosion
W. - Shrapnels that are created after each obstacle

Parameters used for both types:
Shrapnels Count: Number of shrapnels
Shrapnel Speed: Shrapnel speed
Shrapnel Damage: Damage of one shrapnel
Shrapnel Spread: Shrapnel spread cone[/code]
[b]"F. Shrapnels Count"[/b]
[b]"F. Shrapnel Speed (m/s)"[/b]
[b]"F. Shrapnel Damage (hp)"[/b]
[b]"F. Shrapnels Spread (deg)"[/b]
[b]"W. Shrapnels Count"[/b]
[b]"W. Shrapnel Speed (m/s)"[/b]
[b]"W. Shrapnel Damage (hp)"[/b]
[b]"W. Shrapnels Spread (deg)"[/b]

[h3]Logic parameters:[/h3]
[b]"Lose Power With Distance"[/b]
[code]Loss of explosive power with distance[/code]
[b]"Lose Power With Angle"[/b]
[code]Explosion power loss with angle[/code]

[b]"(F)Shrapnels On Despawn"[/b]
[code]The fragments that spawn at the very end[/code]
[b]"(W)Shrapnels On Penetration"[/b]
[code]Shards after each broken block[/code]

[b]"Always explode on ground-hit"[/b]
[code]Always explode when hitting the ground. No ricochet.[/code]

[b]"Modern system of Expl.Lvl."[/b]
[code]Modern armor penetration and power loss system[/code]

[hr][/hr]
[b]Questions about mod - coms, or Discord: https://discord.gg/Wu8nNcp9fm

8ec0b0e1-b0ab-4f34-ae1c-59ad47c6e5ec.description:
This mod is a modding Library that allow a lot of things for mods :[list]
[*]Access the informations of other mods in a local game like :[list]
[*]their differents sets (shape, tool, harvestable...),
[*]their custom Crafting recipes (craftbot, cookbot and trader),
[*]their Descriptions,[/list]
[*]Have all the informations of a part that are in his shapeset (size, flammable, stacksize, set path, original mod Id...),
[*]Introduce an all new tag system like Minecraft, if you want to check an item property, check if it's in a tag that specify this property (this depends on if modders registered their item tags, register your tags in the GFolder below)
[*]Introduce a lot of useful additions for pipe networks : [list]
[*]A global table which contains all of the shapes, containers, pipes, crafters... in a pipe network (pipes and crafters are defined using tags)
[*]The stock game effect of items moving through pipes as a function[/list][/list]

For any suggestion/problems/questions, message me or ping on a server that I'm in on Discord : "[b]@ClashofCraft972[/b]"

For additional informations, check the Github :
https://github.com/ClashofCraft972/CompatLibs/wiki/Compatibility-Library-Wiki
8ec0b0e1-b0ab-4f34-ae1c-59ad47c6e5ec.name: Compatibility Library

this is a texture mod to make clusters of dots easier to navigate as well as a "that way -->" connection line for the funnies so in the rare case that someone asks where that connection went/goes you can just answer "it goes that way" (not mandatory)

this texture mod also includes a dark mode axolot loading screen when booting up the game to avoid the flashbang.

in this link you will find 2 batch scripts to install the texture mod, just drop the one you want in your game folder and run it, its a basic "if not exist" and Xcopy script to make sure everything goes right:

scripts: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1dzJp4nLpZEqNTZQFNK4wsksL3XPRLPqf?usp=sharing



manual installation:

navigate to "steamapps\workshop\content\387990\3063152060"

drag and drop the data and cache folders to your game folder

start game and enjoy

=======================EN==========================

This mod contains all polygons from 1 to 15 blocks long and panels. (but not all types:), but there will be updates in which I will add more and more types of polygons)
Current mod version: 1.4
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changelog
1.0 - Mod has been created
1.1 - Fixed a bug with "Type F" polygons and also fixed translation issues.
1.2 - Panels (Type G) have been added.
1.3 - Fixed problems with panel collision (Type G), and added half-blocks (Type H).
1.4 - Finally added crafting recipes for Custom Game
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Do not judge strictly, this is my first mod.
* I'm reading the comments.
* Why did I decide to make this mod?
  1) I was figuring out the Mod Tool and how everything works there.
  2) Many mods do not contain all the polygons or they are not so long that it is necessary sometimes in creations.
* And I want to announce BAM - Big Air Mod which will be released when I don't know when:) But I'll post about it here. It will add self-guided missiles, good wing blocks, jet engines and cannons.

=======================UA==========================

Цей мод містить всі полігони довжиною від 1 до 15 блоків та панелі. (але не всі типи:), але будуть оновлення, в яких я буду додавати все більше і більше типів полігонів)
Поточна версія мода: 1.4
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Список змін
1.0 - Мод створено
1.1 - Виправлено помилку з полігонами Тип F, а також виправлено проблеми з перекладом.
1.2 - Додано панелі (Тип G).
1.3 - Пофікшено проблеми з колізією панелей (Тип G), і додано напівблоки (Тип H).
1.4 - Нарешті додано рецепти крафтів для Custom Game
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Не судіть строго, це мій перший мод.
* Читаю коментарі.
* Чому я вирішив зробити цей мод?
  1) Я розбирався з Mod Tool і тим, як там все працює.
  2) Багато модів містять не всі полігони або вони не такі довгі, як іноді потрібно в постройках.
* І я хочу анонсувати BAM - Big Air Mod, який буде релізнутий, коли я не знаю коли:) Але я напишу про нього тут. Він додасть самонавідні ракети, хороші блоки крил, реактивні двигуни та гармати.

===================================================

Этот мод содержит все полигоны от 1 до 15 блоков в длину и панели. (но не все типы:), но будут обновления, в которых я буду добавлять все новые и новые типы полигонов)
Текущая версия мода: 1.4
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changelog
1.0 - Мод был создан
1.1 - Исправлена ошибка с полигонами Тип F, а также исправлены проблемы с переводом.
1.2 - Добавлены панели (Тип G).
1.3 - Пофикшены проблеммы с колизией панелей (Тип G), и добавлены полублоки (Тип H).
1.4 - Наконец то добавлены рецепты крафтов для Custom Game
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Не судите строго, это мой первый мод.
* Читаю комментарии.
* Почему я решил сделать этот мод?
  1) Я разбирался с Mod Tool и как там все работает.
  2) Многие моды не содержат всех полигонов или они не такие длинные, что иногда необходимо в постройках.
* И я хочу анонсировать BAM - Big Air Mod, который будет выпущен, когда - не знаю:) Но я напишу об этом здесь. В нем будут добавлены самонаводящиеся ракеты, хорошие блоки крыльев, реактивные двигатели и пушки.

9cd9aae9-a16f-488e-9558-f5188a01f800.description:
[b]This is [u]not[/u] a file mod, and it doesn't require additional installation.
The mod has been tested on version 0.6.6 in Creative game mode.[/b]

Commands:
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Command[/th]
        [th]Description[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/clear[/td]
        [td]Removes all shapes in the world
Rework of the existing command. Does not require /allowclear. Removed /allowclear.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/limited[/td]
        [td]Toggles limited inventory[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/fuel[/td]
        [td]Toggles fuel consumption for creations[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/ammo[/td]
        [td]Toggles ammo consumption for players (if limited inventory is enabled) and mountable spudguns[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/upgrades[/td]
        [td]Toggles whether interactables can be upgraded using component kits[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/noaggro[/td]
        [td]Toggles the player as a target
Rework of the existing command. The value is now stored in the world and restored when the world is loaded again.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/restrictions[/td]
        [td]Toggles restrictions on creations
Rework of the existing command. The value is now stored in the world and restored when the world is loaded again.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/timeofday
 /tod[/td]
        [td]Sets the time of the day as a fraction (0.5 = mid day)
Can be typed without an argument to get current time[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/gravity[/td]
        [td]Sets the gravity (10 = default)
Can be typed without an argument to get current gravity[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]/teleport
/tp[/td]
        [td]Teleports target player to destination. Enter the player's name to refer to player. Coordinates are measured in meters (1 meter = 4 blocks) and entered separately as X Y Z, where Z is the height.
Usage examples:
Teleport yourself to destination:
/tp -12 63.5 41
/tp PlayerName
Teleport other player to destination (Host only):
/tp PlayerName 42.1 -71 0.3
/tp PlayerName Player2Name
Can be typed without arguments to get current position[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/playerlist[/td]
        [td]Displays player IDs and names in chat[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/resetchar[/td]
        [td]Respawn player character at (0,0)[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/export
/ex[/td]
        [td]Exports creation as a blueprint in $MOD_DATA/Blueprints/<name>.json
Can be typed without an argument to get a list of saved creations[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/import
/im[/td]
        [td]Imports creation as a blueprint from $MOD_DATA/Blueprints/<name>.json
Can be typed without an argument to get a list of saved creations[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/swim[/td]
        [td]Toggles whether the character is swimming[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/diving[/td]
        [td]Toggles whether the character is diving[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/tumble[/td]
        [td]Toggles whether the character is tumbling[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/downed[/td]
        [td]Toggles whether the character is downed[/td]
    [/tr]
	[tr]
        [td]/speed[/td]
        [td]Sets the movement speed as a fraction (1=default)
Can be typed without an argument to get current speed fraction[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

The values of commands such as /limited, /timeofday, /gravity, and other world settings are stored in the world and restored when the world is loaded again.


Known issues:
[list]
[*]Player retains velocity when teleported
[*]Since there may be multiple players with the same name, the teleport command will select the first found player with the specified name in the list of players
[*]"/export" and "/import" are not functioning properly on clients
[/list]

677c9cdc-4a3f-4523-9b3d-2602c834ceb7.description:
The most anticipated sequel of all time!
Please like and add to favourites so this mod can survive in the algorithm!

This mod is constantly updated, so leave your feedback in the comments!

BEFORE YOU PLAY!
Do you want more memes?
If so install DLL mods to add more to the experience!
Steps:
1. Go to https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-DLL-Injector/releases/latest
2. Download DLL-Injector-Installer.exe and run it.
3. Go to https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-CustomAudioExtension/releases/latest
4. Download CustomAudioExtension.dll
5. Go to Scrap Mechanic in your steam library
6. Press the small cogwheel on the same bar as the "play" button
7. Go to "manage", then click "bowse local files"
8. Go into the folder called "Release"
9. In there create a new folder called "DLLModules"
10. Move CustomAudioExtension.dll into that folder

PROFIT!

-----------------ALL UPDATES AND PATCHONTES CAN BE FOUND BELOW-----------------
___________
|> Day 0 patch <|
 \_version 1.0.1_/
● Added /switchHUD to toggle custom HUD elements
● Made collision destruction less violent
● Made stars in the night sky bigger to circumvent Scrap Mechanic's rendering issues
● Turned off silly meter as it is unfinished
● Fixed incompatibility with fant mod by disabling the fant mod (To be fixed but I'm lazy)
● Added the missing "2" in the title that's displayed in game
● Fixed collision destruction bugs
