‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
● Optimized the code responsible for playing the metal pipe sound effect
● Added new slash commands to improve user experience
● " /noaggrocreations " bots are no longer agressive to creations
● " /popcapsules " pops all bot capsules that are currently within the render distance
● " /dropscrap " enables and disables haybots dropping their spines upon death
● " /place " places any harvestable of your liking on the ground where you are looking
● ╠> " stone " places a random stone formation
● ╠> " birch " places a random birch tree
● ╠> " leafy " places a random oak (? there is no real counterpart to this tree type) tree
● ╠> " pine " places a random pine tree
● ╚> " spruce " places a random spruce tree (in case you already want to put up Christmas decorations)
● " /clear " clears all creations within render distance. ⚠︎WARNING⚠︎ unlike this command in creative mode this one does not have a warning popup so use it wisely!
● " /collisiondestruction " toggles collision destruction as it is not final and can lead to problems while playing
● " /ammoconsumption " toggles ammo consumption by handheld and mounted guns (ammo includes not only potatoes but also water, chemicals, and anything that can be shot, vaccum pump is exceluded at the moment)
● " /fuelconsumption " toggles fuel consumption by engines, thrusters, etc
● " /partupgrade " toggles the ability to upgrade interactive parts with component kits
● Added a chat message on startup informing the player about how to turn off HUD elements
● Removed the Mod database from dependencies, cutting down on load times and errors in console on startup
___________
|>Version 1.1.1<|
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾
● Slightly reduced file size
● Fixed a bug where " /partupgrade " command would use the state of " /ammoconsumption " for the value (on/off) it displayed in chat
● Fixed a bug where stars would stop rotating during sunrise
● Fixed a bug where stars rotation algorithm would not reset and playing in a world without logging out for long periods of time could lead to errors
● Fixed some typos
● Patch notes are now available at this item's "updates" page
___________
|>Version 1.1.2<|
‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾

● Slightly reduced file size

e05e0ad2-0a5f-46f9-98ab-b26c0a844922.description:
[h3]After over a year of hard work, we proudly present...[/h3]
[h1]One of the [b]BIGGEST[/b] Survival Mods out there![/h1]
From Passionate and Skilled Modders, which want to support the Scrap Mechanic Community!

[hr][/hr]
[img]https://fagiano0.github.io/CrashlanderAPI/images/workshop/logo.png[/img]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Installation Video:[/h1]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qGgndPwXR5w

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Important![/h1]
[list]
[*]This is [b]NOT[/b] a file mod!
[*]File mods [i]will very probably[/i] break the mod, remove them before reporting any issues!
[*]Adding other mods that support [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2816900681]Modded Craftbot Recipes[/url] may throw off the mod balance!
[*]This mod [b]DOES[/b] support multiplayer.
[*]Make sure you have keybinds "Reload" and "Upgrade" bound in the vanilla Options Menu!
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Story Plot:[/h2]
You were sent by Wonk Enterprises to extract resources from a newly acquired planet, but as your spacecraft was nearing its destination, your online systems malfunctioned, causing it to crash.
Now, your objective is to survive on this unfamiliar planet, reestablish communication with Wonk Enterprises, and plan a successful return.

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Feature List:[/h2]
[list]
[*][h3]Content Packed and Sensible Storyline! (Includes many sidequests too!)[/h3]
[/list]

[img]https://fagiano0.github.io/CrashlanderAPI/images/workshop/story_1.jpg[/img]
[img]https://fagiano0.github.io/CrashlanderAPI/images/workshop/story_2.webp[/img]

[/list]

[/list]

67966ead-e036-40ab-856d-2b0708c31001.description:
The Light Detector will Detect if a Light Source ( vanilla lights atm ) is pointing at it.
It Outputs a On Signal then.
With "E" you can Adjust the Sensitivity ( basicly the Max Distance to the Light Source )
With "U" you can Select and Activate the Color Detection of the Light, then it will only Output a On Signal When a Light with the Correct Color lights the Detector up.

Features:

478e0c39-c1be-43fb-a46b-15646abe06a9.description:
this fork of ScriptableComputer
fork creation was approved by the authors of the mod
for the mod to work correctly, there SHOULD BE NO "ScriptableComputer" and/or "SCI" in the world

luaInLua bug fixes:
* most of the luaInLua bugs have been fixed
* local variables now work fine
* the arguments of the functions now also work fine

advantages of SComputers compared to any other computer mods:
* bug fixes (critical filesystem bugs, bugs causing lags, bugs breaking code, and many other extremely unpleasant bugs have been fixed in SComputers)
* compatibility (this mod is fully compatible with the original and with SCI and may also be compatible with other mods in the future)
* responsive support (you can always write a comment to the mod and I will answer it, you can also write to me in the discord "nokodev")
* optimization (displays in SComputers lag much less than in the original)
* the presence of require and built-in libraries (image, midi, vdisplay, base64, utf8, ramfs, etc)
* code examples (code examples in mod will help you figure it out a bit)
* security (from SComputers it is much more difficult to cause bugsplat, game freezes, lags)
* availability of new components
* regular updates (about 4 updates per week)
* support for crafting recipes
* radars are seen a robots/wocs/worms
* ability to use dlm/fullLuaEnv to load code (instead of luaInLua) which will allow you to receive normal error reports

current documentation is "temporary"
because the scrapmechanictool site has closed
also, the SComputers documentation describes only what SComputers adds
you will still need to study the documentation of the parent mod (ScriptableComputer) to have an idea of how the mod works

SComputers documentation: https://github.com/igorkll/SComputers_docs/blob/main/SComputers/Info.md

Tags:
ScriptableComputer, Lua, Programming, Displays, Screens, Coding, DLM, LUA, fork.
478e0c39-c1be-43fb-a46b-15646abe06a9.name: SComputers [Fork]

a65c170c-ede3-4757-9f1a-586eabf1a2bc.description:
This is a custom game. Its just like challenge mode. You can load any challenges available on the workshop.

This mod is a 1:1 clone of challenge mode, but runs as a custom game mode. In the menu book, the host will be able to access the following settings:
[list]
[*] Hide all name tags 
[*] Hiders see name tags (seekers dont)
[*] Full health
[*] Half health
[*] 1 Shot Kill
[*] Spectate when dead
[*] Skybox (input field coming soon)
[*] Inactivity VFX (particle for when you sit still too long)
[*] Fall damage / Collision damage
[*] Player list to toggle between [b]Spectate | Hider | Seeker[/b]
[/list]
Not implemented yet:
[list]
[*] Inactivity VFX
[/list]

ALSO, the 3d model for switches has been replaced with buttons, and there is no longer a press animation

Bugs with LOW priority, are likely going to have zero effect on gameplay, usability, or other important aspects of the game. FIXED bugs are bugs currently in game, but are fixed in the dev version. Known bugs are:
[list]
[*]  [b]LOW PRIORITY[/b]
[list]
[*] [FIXED] Extra empty player exists the menu world
[*] [FIXED] Sometimes clients are loaded into a separate menu world
[/list]
[*]  [b]MEDIUM PRIORITY[/b]
[list]
[*] Currently able to select multiple health modes (1 shot + full health)
[/list]

The host is the only person with the "menu book". DO NOT drop it on the ground! You'll be stuck without it until you reload the entire save file.

Want to learn more about the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3141237343]Challenge Database[/url]?
a65c170c-ede3-4757-9f1a-586eabf1a2bc.name: Hide and Seek for Challenges

20978002-f3ff-47ba-b68a-9f152163cb2a.description:
Basically Survival but blocks&parts mods can influence the gamescript.
RFGS stands for: Run Function as GameScript.
How to Use in a Blocks & Parts mod:
Game.client_override(self,func,to): Overrides a function clientside.
Game.server_override(self,func,to): Overrides a function serverside.
Game.client_rfgs(self,func,params): Runs a specified function as the gamescript clientside.
Game.server_rfgs(self,func,params): Runs a specified function as the gamescript serverside.
20978002-f3ff-47ba-b68a-9f152163cb2a.name: Modular Scrap

e8d9c47d-8029-4441-b662-95ef4ccd55be.description:
[b]Пользовательское радио[/b] — модификация, добавляющая новое радио, которое позволяет наслаждаться разнообразными треками, как специально подобранными разработчиком, так и добавленными самим пользователем.

[h1]Как это работает?[/h1]
[list=1]
[*] Установите [url=https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-DLL-Injector/releases/]SM-DLL-Injector[/url] и [url=https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-CustomAudioExtension/releases/]SM-CustomAudioExtension[/url]
[*] Активируйте мод в игровом мире
[/list]

[h1]Доступные объекты[/h1]
[list]
[*] Пользовательское радио
[*] Радиодинамик
[*] Пульт управления радио
[*] Таймер устройства (работает только в мирах, где течет время)
[/list]

[h1]Почему стоит выбрать этот мод?[/h1]
[list]
[*] [b]Без замены файлов:[/b] Вам не нужно перезапускать игру или заменять файлы bank, как это требуется в традиционных модификациях.
[*] [b]Совместимость:[/b] Минимум конфликтов с другими модами, которые могут использовать разные версии файлов bank.
[*] [b]Простота использования:[/b] Управляйте музыкой быстро и удобно с помощью готовых объектов!
[/list]

[h1]Какие треки вас ждут?[/h1]
Мод находится в бета-версии и включает следующие плейлисты:
[list]
[*] Scrap Mechanic - Radio
[*] [url=https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A4%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%BA]Phonk Radio - Radio Mod[/url]
[*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2476541477]Russian Hardbass Radio - E (RU)[/url]
[*] [url=https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%95%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD]Neon Genesis Evangelion - Shiro SAGISU[/url]
[*] [url=https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8C_%D0%B8_%D0%A8%D1%83%D1%82]Подборка #1 - Король и Шут (RU)[/url]
[/list]

[h1]Добавьте свои треки![/h1]
Вы можете легко настроить радио под свои вкусы:
[list]
[*] [b]Ручное добавление:[/b] Добавьте треки через файлы мода.
[*] [b]Custom Radio Manager:[/b] Используйте [url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ndqaF3vAaxhKE7nunuXn1MYdKF-Y13Tn/view]программу Custom Radio Manager[/url], которая автоматически скачает необходимые расширения и упростит настройку.
[/list]
[quote]⚠ Для работы Custom Radio Manager требуется [url=https://dotnet.microsoft.com/ru-ru/download/dotnet-framework/net472]Microsoft .Net Framework 4.7.2[/url].[/quote]

[h1]Планы на будущее[/h1]
[list]
[*] Новые музыкальные треки
[*] Новые устройства
[*] Исправление проблем
[/list]

46bb04c8-d813-4eb8-98c1-e8936a6bed67.description:
Use any block as a texture!

No longer do you have to match your blocks to wedges, now you can match wedges to blocks!

First set a texture by holding a block and pressing E, then lock that texture with the U key.

Works with all blocks, no matter if modded or vanilla.

Part list:
- Framed beam
- Framed corner beam
- Framed cross
- Framed slab

88ba8635-775e-4759-9a69-3df71f653f19.description:
[h2]Recommended Mods[/h2]
[list]
[*][b][url=https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-CustomAudioExtension#readme]SM-DLM[/url][/b] by [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/QuestionMarko]Questionable Mark[/url][/b] allows you to hear new sounds that have been added to the mod
[*][b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1903792337]Machine Guns Pack[/url][/b] by [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198280635682]Driver[/url][/b] adds a variety weapons, machine guns and sights
[/list]
[hr][/hr]
[b]Join [url=https://discord.gg/vhbSdmBNKw]Tank Parts discord server[/url][/b]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Features[/h1]
[h3]Breech[/h3]
[list]
[*]37mm M5
[*]75mm KwK 42
[*]76mm ZiS-5
[*]76mm F-34
[*]88mm KwK 36
[*]105mm M68A1
[*]122mm D-25T
[*]125mm 2A46M
[*]152mm M-10T
and more
[/list]
[h3]Different Shell Types[/h3]
Currently the mod has
[list]
[*][b]Armor-Piercing shells[/b]
[*][b]Armor-Piercing Composite Rigid shells[/b] - can break stronger armor, but doesn't explode and loses its penetration capacity more than AP shells
[*][b]Armor-Piercing High-Explosive shells[/b] - breaks the armor and explodes behind it. It doesn't explode if the armor were too weak
[*][b]High-Explosive shells[/b] - explodes at any hit and throws a lot of shrapnel
[*][b]High-Explosive Anti-Tank shells[/b] - Does not lose penetration capacity with distance, but lose 10 of it for each air block behind the target
[/list]
[h3]Advanced Penetration Simulation[/h3]
Shells have penetration capacity. The higher this value, the bigger sum of the blocks durability the shell can break
[h3]Different Shells Strength[/h3]
Each breech has different shells strength. For example, KwK 42 is stronger than F-34
[h3]More Interactive Parts[/h3]
[list]
[*][b]Turret Steer[/b] - connect it to bearings to rotate them with A and D. You can adjust the speed with 1 and 2
[*][b]Periscope[/b] - connect it to a viewport and look from behind the walls. Connect it to bearings to turn your viewport with WASD
[*][b]More[/b] you will find in the game!
[/list]
[hr][/hr]
[h1]Credits[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Special thanks[/b] to [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Red-Builds]The Red Builder[/url][/b] for helping with SM modding!
[*][b]Thanks[/b] to [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198280635682]Driver[/url][/b] for helping with animations
[/list]
[hr][/hr]
[b]Join [url=https://discord.gg/vhbSdmBNKw]Tank Parts discord server[/url] to get mod support![/b]
88ba8635-775e-4759-9a69-3df71f653f19.name: Tank Parts

43f2e45f-57ec-4c60-8432-c9cc7a1cfde5.description:
[h2]-- Features of this mod --[/h2]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/VW18t5r.jpg[/img]

[b]Grow Container[/b]
Introducing a new, portable and nomad-friendly interactable: Grow Container. If you ever wanted to farm without the tension of raids, or do not have enough edibles to survive, then this new interactable is for you. This advanced soil box of technology will enable a mechanic to grow crops and plants on the go at the cost of batteries. You can place this on your vehicle or on top of your base. It does NOT trigger raids but rather consumes batteries to operate. The interactable comes in three tiers or levels:
[olist]
   [*]Grow Container tier 1
   [list]
      [*]Can grow all crops including corn, pigment flower and cotton
      [*]Has average consumption efficiency
      [*]Has average durability
      [*]Grows crops at an average speed
      [*]Cannot grow fertilized crops
      [*]Cannot be automated
   [/list]
   [*]Grow Container tier 2
   [list]
      [*]Can grow all crops including corn, pigment flower and cotton
      [*]Has good consumption efficiency
      [*]Has better durability
      [*]Grows crops at a slightly faster speed
      [*]Can grow fertilized crops
      [*]Cannot be automated
   [/list]
   [*]Grow Container tier 3
   [list]
      [*]Can grow all crops including corn, pigment flower and cotton
      [*]Has good consumption efficiency
      [*]Has good durability
      [*]Grows crops at an even faster speed
      [*]Can grow fertilized crops
      [*]Can be automated
   [/list]
[/olist]
[b]Note:[/b] To upgrade the tier, a separate GUI will be opened after pressing the upgrade button on the main GUI which will state all the requirements for the upgrade.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/NNw4uUj.jpg[/img]

[b]Unit Spawner Gun[/b]
Ever wanted to out lag out your world by spawning hundreds of bots, but couldn't do it easily? Well now you can with this new 'gun'. This gun literally shoots units, be it animals or bots. The features of this new tool include:
[list]
   [*]Works in multiplayer
   [*]Can shoot all in-game vanilla units
   [*]The velocity of the units shot can be adjusted
   [*]The colour of the unit can be customized
   [*]The shoot cooldown of the gun be changed
   [*]Auto gun mode which enables continuous fire
   [*]The spread of the shot can be modified
   [*]The number of units spawned per shot can be altered
   [*]Can even shoot units from other mods
[/list]

[b]Explosion Spawner[/b]
Time to get a little explosive. A new, explosive interactive: Explosion Spawner. It randomly spawns explosions within a set frequency. Interact with it by pressing ‘E’, hit with a sledgehammer or any melee weapons, or even shoot at it with a spudgun to activate or deactivate explosions. Press ‘U’ while looking at it to customize its settings. The features of this interactive include:
[list]
 [*]Randomly (relative location) spawns explosions
 [*]Shoot at it or hit it or press ‘E’ to activate explosions
 [*]Press ‘U’ to open GUI
 [*]In it, its level, magnitude, destruction and impulse radii, frequency of explosions and area covered can be adjusted and changed according to your preferences
[/list]

[img]https://imgur.com/IPnwkvG.jpg[/img]

[b]New Crop: Blackberry[/b]
Not enough crop variety? Introducing a new plantable: Blackberry. These berries give less nutrition but grow in pairs (You get 2 per harvest). Blackberry seeds can be obtained from the trader for [b]2 Tomato Crates and 1 Blueberry crate[/b]. They take the same time to grow as normal blueberries. Due to some limitations, they do not trigger raids. Also, blackberries can be grown in the Grow Container.

[b]Portable Woc[/b]
Are your wocs running all over the place? Or are you a nomad who can’t carry wocs along with you? Not to worry! This mod will give you the power to produce woc milk on the go or anywhere you wish. However, it will consume a bit more corn and even water to produce delicious woc milk from this interactive. It can be crafted in the craftbot, if you have Modded Craftbot Recipes installed. However, you’ll need a baby woc to be able to craft it. A baby woc can be obtained either through the trader, (Again, you must have Moddrd Craftbot Recipes installed) or get it as loot from feeding a woc (5% chance, if you have my Custom Loot mod installed). It also has 2 levels, which can be upgraded using appropriate materials:

[olist]
   [*]Portable Woc 1
   [list]
      [*]Can produce woc milk using corn and water
      [*]Produces [b]1 woc milk for 4 corn and 4 water[/b]
      [*]Has average durability
      [*]Produces milk at an average speed
      [*]Cannot be automated
   [/list]
   [*]Portable Woc 2
   [list]
      [*] Can produce woc milk using corn and water
      [*]Produces [b]1 woc milk for 4 corn and 4 water[/b]
      [*]Has better durability
      [*]Produces milk at an average speed
      [*]Can be automated
   [/list]
[/olist]

[b]Portable Glowbug[/b]
And as for glow bugs, you can nurture them as well, on the go or anywhere you wish! Just like the portable woc, it has 2 levels and can be crafted in the craftbot, if you have Modded Craftbot Recipes installed. It will also conusune more cardboard and water to produce glow. You’ll need a glow bug egg to craft it, which can be obtained either from the trader (Modded Craftbot Recipes must be installed) or as loot from feeding a glow bug (2.5% chance, and must have Custom Loot installed). The features of the different levels are;

[olist]
   [*]Portable Glowbug 1
   [list]
      [*]Can produce glow using cardboard and water
      [*]Produces [b]1 glow for 20 cardboard and 20 water[/b]
      [*]Has average durability
      [*]Produces glow at an average speed
      [*]Cannot be automated
   [/list]
   [*]Portable Glowbug 2
   [list]
      [*] Can produce glow using cardboard and water
      [*]Produces [b]1 glow for 20 cardboard and 20 water[/b]
      [*]Has better durability
      [*]Produces glow at an average speed
      [*]Can be automated
   [/list]
[/olist]

[b]Note: In Crashlander, baby woc and glow bug egg can be crafted in the workbench.[/b]

[b]Wind Turbine[/b]
Living on a hill? You need to take advantage of the wind blowing by. With this interactive placed on your base (or vehicle), you’ll passively generate batteries depending on your altitude. The higher the wind turbine is, the faster it will generate batteries for you. The wind turbine can be crafted in the craftbot, assuming you have Modded Craftbot Recipes installed. At a certain height above the ground, it will reach a max generating speed. [WIP]

[b]Fly Command[/b]
Is your creation miles away from you? No problem! With this handy dandy command, you can fly to your creation in seconds. The command is as follows:

[table]
 [tr]
  [th]Command[/th]
  [th]Description[/th]
 [/tr]
 [tr]
  [td]/flymode[/td]
  [td]Toggles flying mode[/td]
 [/tr]
 [tr]
  [td]/flymode <number>[/td]
  [td]Sets the sprinting speed while flying[/td]
 [/tr]
[/table]

And much more…

[h2]Survival Support[/h2]
This mod is fully compatible with [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2816900681]Modded Craftbot Recipes[/url][/b] and any other related custom gamemodes.

This mod is also compatible with [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3113900342]Crashlander: Square One[/url][/b].

This mod requires [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3245275413]Harvestables as Shapes[/url][/b] and has custom loot hence also requiring [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3224128169]Custom Loot[/url][/b].

[h1]Credits[/h1]
Part of this mod was inspired and assisted by [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2824149581]Raft Mechanic: Tools and Parts for Creative[/url][/b] and their creator(s).
43f2e45f-57ec-4c60-8432-c9cc7a1cfde5.name: Useful Utilities

e84b6c7d-b5d1-40e3-a37a-32156a4a3267.description:
This mod adds full-fledged destruction physics to the game.
This mod works automatically and does not require complicated configuration.
This mod (unlike similar ones available in the workshop) allows you to destroy one object against another (for example, you can break through a house with a car).
Please note that large creations can break down under their own weight.
The quality of destruction physics may decrease with lower FPS!!
The mod is not yet fully completed, and there may be bugs and inaccuracies in it.
IT IS STRONGLY NOT RECOMMENDED TO BUILD ANYTHING IN THE WORLD WHERE THIS MOD IS ENABLED, AS YOUR CREATION MAY SPONTANEOUSLY COLLAPSE!!!!
e84b6c7d-b5d1-40e3-a37a-32156a4a3267.name: advanced destruction physics

e933f3f8-7c50-402f-bdc4-db931d136a6c.description:
this API adds additional methods to the game.
however, it does not provide full access to the lua API.
the documentation is located in a folder inside the mod: Docs/docs.md

THESE ARE NOT BUGS (yes, I'm tired of explaining this to everyone):
1. IT IS NORMAL IF OPENED A LARGE NUMBER OF COMMAND LINES WHEN YOU START betterAPI.
2. IF ERRORS APPEAR IN THESE COMMAND LINES, JUST IGNORE THEM! EVERYTHING IS GOING ACCORDING TO PLAN!.
3. IT'S OK IF THE GAME RESTARTS SEVERAL TIMES AFTER INSTALLING betterAPI.
4. IF YOU SEE COMMAND LINES, JUST COLLAPSE THEM! DO NOT CLOSE THEM, OTHERWISE THE GAME WILL CLOSE.

manual installation:
1. close scrap mechanic
2. subscribe to the mod
3. open folder: Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\3177944610\content
4. copy all files
5. open folder: Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Release
6. insert all the files with the replacement

[url=https://igorkll.github.io/betterAPI/index.html] DOCUMENTATION [/url]
[url=https://discord.gg/uJrsmUjaMG] DISCORD SERVER [/url]
e933f3f8-7c50-402f-bdc4-db931d136a6c.name: better API [file mod]

a99716ca-719d-4891-b1d2-f1978e954a05.description:
This radio runs on betterAPI and can play music via a direct link.
unfortunately, you cannot insert a link from youtube or something like that here,
but you can place your .mp3/.wav file on any hosting (for example, github) and insert a direct (raw) link to the file.
direct links to streaming Internet radio stations will also work (however, connecting to a streaming radio station can take a long time and not the first time).

SComputers api:
component name - onlineBoombox
onlineBoombox.play()
onlineBoombox.stop()
onlineBoombox.setVolume(value:number(0-1))
onlineBoombox.setMute(state:boolean)
onlineBoombox.setUrl(url:string)
a99716ca-719d-4891-b1d2-f1978e954a05.name: online boombox [betterAPI]

862cc8db-9b52-4ffa-b149-52d1795f5034.description:
-------------------------------------------------------

This is my first mod :), this mod adds 2 new parts that is used with the Modpack Continuation number logic.

The first part is a gyroscope that can control the angular velocity of your creation to rotate him in the direction of the arrow with number input and adapt his force to the mass and the inertia of the creation. The second is a small gimbal thruster where you can adjust the direction that the thruster point with number input, red input is pitch, green is yaw, white inputs are multiply with the power and the power are set with any color input.

----------- Warnings And Bugs :

The gyroscope adapt his force to the mass and the inertia of the creation and this is really powerful, so if you put more than 1 gyro that rotate in the same axis the result will be unstable and uncertain, sometime it works and sometimes the creation fly away so make sur to save it before, also in general the gyro is for now more stable with higher mass, so be careful with light creation and gyro, otherwise you creation will go to space :)

I will try to improve the gyro as best as possible over time to make it more stable and will probably divide its strength according to the number of gyros with the same axis placed on a creation, but in any case only one gyro per axis should do the trick

----------- Current Mod Status :

The Gimbal And The Gyro Work, I still need to review the description of the Steam page as well as the objects in the game to make it easier to understand how to use them, I will also soon put tutorial and demo videos on the Steam page and redo a better thumbnail, also for now i working on a new part, The Compass, because I tried to align the gimbal with the orient block of the modpack but for that the orient block must always remain straight and there are too many data conversions so this block will simplify things, I will say more once the block is finished, I also made a small change to all blocks interface, also now the gimbals can receive white inputs which will be multiplied instead of being added, all of this will soon be explained in a video, For now I'm going to finish the Compass and try to make the gyro more stable because it is still very unstable, especially with PIDs.

I will try to do all of this as quickly as possible but it will take me some time because I have to learn a lot of things on the job

----------- Goals And Ideas :

-- a mountable grabber of 1*2 block with the appearance of a portal gun which would be a 
gravity gun controllable with number logic

-- a rope spring thing displayed with effects and a dynamic catenary curve to give a realistic rope look

-- a Conic Sensor adjustable with number logic, with multiple modes

-------------------------------------------------------

The Mod is still in development so it will probably still have some bugs, if you find some weird behavior that are not mentioned in the warnings or bugs tell me in the comment of the mod, also there may be new parts that will be added over time.

Also anyone can reuse code or assets from the mod, If you do so i would be happy to be credited but it's optional.

And if anybody wants to help me whether it is for the code, modeling or just to give ideas im open.
If you want to ask me something or talk about suggestions you can dm me on my discord : _mahorin_

-------------------------------------------------------
862cc8db-9b52-4ffa-b149-52d1795f5034.name: Gyro And Gimbal MOD / [ The Modpack Continuation Addon ]

cd85eacc-f183-4da6-b8fd-d096ee1cb18e.description:
For mod makers, You can make mods more easier and much quicker. It'll make some things more better and efficient. 

Here are the items:
[list]
[*]Mod Editor - The orange handbook that would be a modder's favorite tool for naming items and crafting recipes.

[*]Super Interactor - A modder's debugging tool. You can use this to reconfigure some things into your mod.

[*]Sledge Destroyer - A sledge hammer that's capable of destroying anything.

[*]The Manipulator - The tool that can serve as commands. In fact, ALL tools requires admin access (Not necessarily for this tool, but non-admins have access to a few commands), and this tool lets the host set temporary admin powers.

[*]Creation Binder - You can pick up creations and carry a creation around. In case if the creation you're carrying acting so crazy because of your mod item, then this is for you.

[*]Quantom Chest - This chest allows you to access containers set by the Super Interactor.
[/list]
cd85eacc-f183-4da6-b8fd-d096ee1cb18e.name: Mod Utility Tools

aa819b34-8932-49a8-8f87-7a80aeb81645.description:
EN | English
[New Update!]
🔋 Shield Block Features:

Connect a container with batteries (multiple allowed) + provide a logic signal to activate.

Low energy consumption while idle (as long as batteries are available).

High battery drain when damaged: The more damage a projectile/bomb inflicts, the more batteries are consumed to protect the structure.

Survival Mode compatible!
⚠️ Warning: Activating the shield while attached to the ground may cause instability!

💧 Extra Pump Storage Block Features:

Connect red/green buttons to suck in and store parts inside the block.
⚠️ Warning: Destroying the block while it contains items will permanently delete stored contents!

RU | Русский
[Новое обновление!]
🔋 Особенности блока щита:

Подключите контейнер с батареями (можно несколько) + подайте логический сигнал для активации.

Низкое потребление энергии в режиме ожидания (пока есть батареи).

Высокий расход батарей при уроне: Чем сильнее урон от снаряда/бомбы, тем больше батарей тратится для защиты конструкции.

Работает в режиме выживания!
⚠️ Внимание: Включение щита, прикрепленного к земле, может вызвать ошибки!

💧 Особенности блока Extra Pump Storage:

Подключите красную/зеленую кнопки для всасывания и хранения деталей (part-ов) внутри блока.
⚠️ Внимание: Уничтожение блока с содержимым приведет к безвозвратной потере хранимых предметов!

Tags: Energy, Defense, Storage, Automation, Survival, Logic Systems
Supported Modes: Creative, Survival
Version: 1.2 (Updated)
aa819b34-8932-49a8-8f87-7a80aeb81645.name: shields and reactors

a24e1bfe-7492-4b19-808a-c3773e449970.description:
This mod adds the Canister Launcher, a shape that fires explosive canisters at players.

This project is the product of one of my university courses. I may eventually port some of it's functionality to another mod I plan* to make in the future.

If you find any bugs I'd be glad to hear about them, however I cannot guarantee I get to them in the future.

Please note that Scrap Mechanics collisions are unreliable at best. While the slider for velocity goes up to 500, I don't recommend you use that. At those speeds the canister will phase through you in direct fire mode, or hit the ceiling in indirect fire mode.

bc643a44-a343-4c97-8213-f649ae5cd0b1.description:
This is a fork of LemonSurvival 2.0 but with a twist!

Devy's Changes:
-The Floor is Lava! DO NOT TOUCH THE FLOOR AT ALL COST!
-If you have a water bucket filled with water. You will survive 1 touch!



Commands
/permadeath - When you die, you cannot respawn
/hprecovery - Disable hp recovery when you're not hungry
/hpgainfromfood - foods such as bananas, redbeets, sunshake etc. now give you hp when consuming.
Pair this with the last command to have a more unforgiving but still balanced survival experience.



-Little Notes:
Thank you waterlemon for creating this! It's been a blast playing it!



Credits:
waterlemon, Dart Frog, Questionable Mark - Modded Craftbot Recipes
bc643a44-a343-4c97-8213-f649ae5cd0b1.name: Devy's Lava + Lemon

7d0f5ec5-745b-4724-90ac-c322133bc932.description:
[i]This mod adds vertical gauges with emission and a number function.[/i]
Great compatibility to Machine HP bar.

[h2]Contains:[/h2]

[b]blocks (compatibility):[/b]
- 1/1  ( Full blocks )
- 1/2  ( Half blocks )
- 1/4  ( X's details )
- 1/5  ( Legend )
- 1/8  ( X's delails )
- 1/10 ( Modpack Polygons, MJM, Fant, Plates by Lord Pain )

[b]pipes:[/b]
- small pipe
- medium pipe

[b]numberlogic unit:[/b]
- Compact Arithmetic Operator


[h2]Compact Arithmetic Operator[/h2]

[i]Number of calculation blocks reduced by up to one-eighth.[/i]

- This part stores up to 4 numbers used in arithmetic.
- Using them, you can combine [b]"addition, multiplication" and "maximum/minimum"[/b] in any order you like.
- Your formula is displayed in the settingGUI, and highlighted by operator.

- You can change the display name, for example to a function name. Or you can use it as a note.
7d0f5ec5-745b-4724-90ac-c322133bc932.name: Vertical Gauge

a929f1de-4824-456c-b3ac-da6c47a4b4a2.description:
This mod enables survival functionality in creative.(Haven't tested in custom game modes)

The mod offers a few chat commands to customize your experience.
[b]Host only commands[/b]
[list]
[*]/pvp - Enables player vs player mode, players can hurt each other
[*]/healthregeneration - Toggles health regeneration
[*]/hunger - Toggles hunger
[*]/thirst - Toggles thirst
[*]/breathloss - Toggles breath loss underwater
[*]/respawnstats - Sets start HP, thirst and hunger
[*]/creativeinventory - Toggles the creative inventory
[*]/collisiontumble - Toggles whether you can tumble from collisions
[*]/collisiondamage - Toggles whether you can take damage from collisions
[*]/godmode - Toggles god mode
[*]/savepreset - Saves the current settings by name
[*]/loadpreset - Loads settings by the preset name
[*]/dropitems - Whether players drop death bags after dying
[*]/ammoconsumption - Toggles whether weapons consume ammunition
[*]/createteam - Creates a team with a name and colour(optional)
[*]/deleteteam - Deletes a team
[*]/friendlyfire - Toggles friendly fire
[*]/setrespawncooldown - Sets the respawn cooldown
[*]/unseatondamage - Sets whether the player gets unseated upon receiving damage
[/list]

[b]Commands usable by everyone[/b]
[list]
[*]/setspawnpoint - Sets your spawn point(takes priority over beds)
[*]/clearspawnpoint - Clears your spawn point
[*]/setteam - Sets your team
[*]/clearteam - Clears your team
[*]/listteams - Lists all the current teams in the chat
[*]/displaynames - Sets the name display mode(1 - all / 2 - teammates only / 3 - none)
[/list]
a929f1de-4824-456c-b3ac-da6c47a4b4a2.name: Enable Survival Player

26b2f950-82f5-48f8-b0e4-8ca1d27ecfb4.description:
This is a dependancy mod that adds custom loot. It integrates loot of other mods with the game.

[img]https://imgur.com/w2qIWGj.jpg[/img]
[b]Loot Terminal[/b]
Adding custom loot manually is quite inconvenient. So, this mod comes included with a custom loot editor accessible in-game. The structure of the GUI is described as follows:

[olist]
 [*]Loot Table
 [list]
    [*]Displays the current selected loot table
    [*]Click on it to change current loot table
    [*]It represents the name of the loot table (for example, "loot_haybot", "loot_farmbot")
 [/list]
 [*]Random Loot
 [list]
    [*]Displays the current selected random loot
    [*]Click on it to change current random loot
    [*]It represents the table of all loot elements which are spawned randomly
 [/list]
 [*]Select Loot
 [list]
    [*]Displays the current selected select loot
    [*]Click on it to change current select loot
    [*]It represents the table of all loot elements which are spawned randomly, however only one is spawned unlike random loot where more are spawned depending on slots
 [/list]
 [*]Overall Chance
 [list]
    [*]Displays overall chance of the selected loot table
    [*]Click on it to edit the value (press enter after typing to confirm change)
    [*]It represents the chance of triggering the loot table (for example, a overall chance of 2 means the loot will be spawned at a 1 in 2 chance)
 [/list]
 [*]Slots
 [list]
    [*]Displays slots of the selected loot table
    [*]Click on it to edit the value (press enter after typing to confirm change)
    [*]It represents the number of loot spawned which can be picked up
 [/list]
 [*]Chance
 [list]
    [*]Displays relative chance of the selected random loot or select loot
    [*]Click on it to edit the value (press enter after typing to confirm change)
    [*]It represents the relative chance of spawning between the loot elements (for example, if one loot element has 1 relative chance and the other 9, then 90% of the time the second will spawn while 10% of the time first will spawn instead)
 [/list]
 [*]Quantity
 [list]
    [*]Displays quantity of the selected random loot or select loot
    [*]Click on it to edit the value (press enter after typing to confirm change)
    [*]It represents the quantity of loot spawned
 [/list]
 [*]Uuid (Item)
 [list]
    [*]Displays uuid (item) of the selected random loot or select loot
    [*]Click on it to select an item (press 'E' or close GUI to confirm change)
    [*]It represents the loot item spawned
 [/list]
 [*]Create New (Loot/Random/Select)
 [list]
    [*]Creates a new (Loot table/Random loot/Select loot)
    [*]Entered value must be non-empty and (Loot table/Random loot/Select loot) name must be unique
 [/list]
 [*]Delete (Table/Random/Select)
 [list]
    [*]Delete the current selected (Loot table/Random loot/Select loot)
    [*](Loot table/Random loot/Select loot) cannot be deleted if it is the only one in the file
 [/list]
 [*]Randomization Functions (All the ... buttons)
 [list]
    [*]Sets a function to randomize values
    [*]Click on it to select randomization function
    [*][b]Note:[/b] For randomStackAmount function, you must input min (least value), mean (average value) and max (maximum value)
 [/list]
 [*]Toggle Buttons (On or Off)
 [list]
    [*]Toggles random loot or select loot
    [*]If turned off, the corresponding loot will not be saved in the file
    [*]Either one must always be toggled
 [/list]
 [*]Save File
 [list]
    [*]Saves all the data in the file
    [*]The path to the saved file is 'workshop\content\387990\3224128169\CustomLoot\CustomLoot.json' (A format of the custom loot table is given in the mod's folder)
 [/list]
[/olist]

[h2]How to create custom loot[/h2]
Here is a step by step guide to create your own loot.

[b]Step 1:[/b] Place the part and interact with it to get started
[b]Step 2:[/b] Create a new loot table by pressing the respective button
[b]Step 3:[/b] Name must be unique and non-empty. For this guide, I've named it 'loot_haybot'
[b]Step 4:[/b] For simplicity, select loot is turned off. Now set the uuid (item)
[b]Step 5:[/b] Now change overall chance value, pressing enter after typing to confirm it. Do the same for slots, chance and quantity
[b]Step 6:[/b] Save the file
[b]Step 7:[/b] Go to the mod's CustomLoot folder --> 'workshop\content\387990\3224128169\CustomLoot'
[b]Step 8:[/b] Copy the entire folder and place it in your mod's script folder
[b]Step 9:[/b] Load the mod on any custom game. I have loaded Modded Craftbot Recipes in my case
[b]Step 10:[/b] Voilà! you have made your very own customized loot. If everything was done correctly, you should see your mod uuid in the dev console next to custom loot

[h3]Note: Only mods which are updated in the mod database will have their custom loot loaded in-game[/h3]

[h1]Credits[/h1]
Big Thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2816900681][b]Modded Craftbot Recipes[/b][/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2925449174][b]Modder Utilities[/b][/url] and their creators for their valuable assistance in making this mod possible.
26b2f950-82f5-48f8-b0e4-8ca1d27ecfb4.name: Custom Loot

6f81dd7b-9bc9-45e7-9bba-29e09931b8a9.description:
Это "форк" или серьезная модификация оригинального мода Drive для Scrap Mechanic.
В моде уже столько изменено, что это по сути это уже фактически новый мод! Даже есть ФИНАЛ!
Теперь, он называется, Drive Enchanted Edition by Cloudiam.
А самое главное, теперь это ХАРДМОД! Выживать будет не просто!

ИЗМЕНЕНИЯ:
1. Огромное кол-во различных улучшений в спауне предметов, полный ребаланс
2. Убран лифт из инвентаря, зато добавлена уточка!
3. Теперь есть жажда и голод
4. Теперь можно делать огороды и сажать семена, добавлено: ведро, вода, баки с водой, семена и мешок с землей, а также водная пушка (для продвинутых механиков).
5. Теперь из коричневых квадратных ящиков можно выбить много НОВЫХ предметов. (используйте кувалду)
6. Добавлено много новых предметов. Ищите внимательно!

17: Добавлен новый лут из ящиков: пила, пушка для машины, пулемет Гатлинга, подшипник, хлопок, янтарь, клей. Повышен процент выпадения пушек.

01a8078f-46d0-495b-87ab-5b53e74d6ef9.description:
Long Drive - custom game for Scrap Mechanic based on Drive custom game

Difference:
- lift tool removed
- hunger returned but not thirst
- the stamina system for running has been reworked, similar to swimming underwater
- the respawn system has been reworked
- fixed effects system
- more effects added
- some locations added
- game world some expanded
- world border now deals damage
- fixed game crash after using the portals (but it is not exactly)


This is not the final version of the mod. If there is interest, the mod will be further developed.

Current version: 0.1
Type "/version" in game chat to check your installed version of the mod

If you have any questions or errors, write here in the comments.

Also, if you want to help with the development of the mod, you can send your creations, and perhaps they will be added.
01a8078f-46d0-495b-87ab-5b53e74d6ef9.name: Long Drive

08560312-2329-4f21-ae71-d5ce9259e16f.description:
This mod is an improved version of an improved version of the mod Drive.
More details on the authors below.

Objective of the Game: Drive!
This mod is a Scrap Mechanic version of the game "The Long Drive."

Features:

Food and Health: It is impossible to die of hunger or thirst. Health does not regenerate naturally. The player must consume food to regenerate health points.

Lift: The lift is activated.

Enemies: Enemies spawn on the road and at points of interest (POI).

Vegetable Cultivation: It is possible to cultivate vegetables on vehicles, so there is no reason to stay still. Raids are disabled.
08560312-2329-4f21-ae71-d5ce9259e16f.name: The Scrap Drive

72089d74-d2cb-4c69-898c-0bb1d9ec3f9d.description:
We all know nukes are really laggy when put up against complex builds, or even just simple creations. 

In order to stop your pesky so called "friends" from placing nukes and lagging out your game, this mod constantly removes them from all player inventories. Say goodbye to that green nightmarish aura!

This mod prevents placing the nuclear bomb item from Durf's, "The Modpack BETA."

oh btw, they don't remove it from the ground itself, just the inventory.

# Install instructions:
1. Head into the mod's folder (C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\387990\3270297474)
2. Go inside the Effects folder, followed by Audio and Banks.
3. Copy the 'Master Bank.bank' file into C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Data\Audio\Banks
4. Done!

2021b67f-b214-4508-ab47-1155b7a96b25.description:
Adds in parts that allow for a "Combustion Piston Engine." When activated, a force is applied to both sides of the piston/slider.

Use the "pipe force" parts on each end of the slider. The side with the kink in it should be the side connected to the slider. Hook the two pipe force parts up as you would the piston in a normal engine. Some piston stretch is required, as when the slider is compressed too much, it can cause problems.

Fun mod to play around with, comes with 8 creations I have made personally, 6 engines, a car, and a tractor.
2021b67f-b214-4508-ab47-1155b7a96b25.name: Combustion Piston Engine

5e308f63-63d3-46b6-adf2-f8ebfc976f4d.description:
Discord: https://discord.gg/9NwK65xe2G

[h1]Fast Logic [/h1]
With great optimization, comes great speed. Fast logic provides significant acceleration compared to vanilla logic gates and makes the use of logic for practical purposes much more viable.
[list]
[*][b]Fast Logic Gate[/b]
Behaves just like a vanilla logic gate, until you hover over it and press U. This will significantly increase the speed at which your logic runs. On top of this, fast logic gates allow you to change the color of their connection dot with the help of the multitool.
[*][b]Single Tick Step Button[/b]
This button can be used to stop the simulation of Fast Logic. When pressing it the first time the simulation speed will be set to 0. Every time you press it after that it will step the simulation one tick. This is useful when debugging a creation because you can see exactly what happens on every tick.
[*][b]End Tick Button[/b]
This block is used to end the current simulation tick. By powering it by with a logic input it makes the creation only run one more simulation tick till the next game tick. This can be used to automatically synchronize displays to the tickspeed of the game.
[/list]

[h1]Silicon[/h1]
Logic gates cause lag due to their existence, the calculation of physics, and the updating of logic states. The solution to this is to consolidate cuboids of logic into "silicon" blocks, which internally store all the data that the logic gates inside would have had and behave exactly the same. These silicon blocks are much better for game performance. A side effect of consolidating blocks together is that we can perform data compression on the logic blocks stored inside the silicon blocks, leading to significantly smaller file sizes. This means you can save much larger logic creations on your lift without needing to worry about spawning them.

[h1]Multitool[/h1]
The multitool is a new tool that allows players to easily manipulate logic efficiently. It has functions that work with the rest of the mod such as converting to fast logic or silicon and colorizing the fast logic connection dots. It also has functions that let you quickly and effortlessly manufacture logic by creating large amounts of connections quickly. Many tools allow you to shorten the time it takes to create logic from hours to minutes. On top of that, many helper tools are present that allow you to debug your logic quickly.

[h3]Here are just a few of the tools this mod adds[/h3]

[h2]Connection Shower[/h2]
Allows you to see the inputs and outputs of any gate (Even inside of a silicon block). This is great when you have a mess of wires.
[img]https://media.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExdWFsODRtMDIxMmNwcnB5aTdsYWVtcGZjdjBtMGV5cHBvcDJ3YndwNiZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/Txbf3zPT7py96SI8os/giphy.gif[/img]

[h2]Parallel Connect[/h2]
Connects rows of gates in parallel very quickly. Great for wiring up complex circuits.
[img]https://media.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExMzZ4NnZsNnF0emZnaDA3d3dsbXA4ZXUwc3J6dDRkNmEycnIwb3Q3MCZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/Nm4MDReXKguzcfhPc7/giphy.gif[/img]

[h2]Tensor Connect[/h2]
Parallel connect's big brother. Makes orders of magnitude more connections than parallel connect efficiently.
[img]https://media.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExenY0emY4d3d1MG95Z3B1eDQwb2NoeXZxMGw1djd6YXI3ZGFmbnRoOSZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/A0CuwesGXJfCwTvoEt/giphy.gif[/img]

[h2]Volume Placer[/h2]
Have you ever needed [b]a lot[/b] of logic gates in a cube? This is the tool for you!
[img]https://media.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExNGJlMXE4bXl0NXNyemp4ZGM4ZGFoc2lzazZqMTNnc3IwaXVweXA3YSZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/3NEm5yO91VaoXUi0qA/giphy.gif[/img]

[h2]One Tick Hammer[/h2]
You can hit a fast logic gate with a hammer to pulse it for one tick.
[img]https://media.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExbDR1NmY1MnVja3Zsbm94MnJ3OGVndjZvYjVibTUwbG1vZzVqbDAzcCZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/JuiP8UJhrinbzLtztC/giphy.gif[/img]

[h2]Colored Connection Dots[/h2]
You can change the connection dot color of fast logic gates to allow for better clarity within your circuits.
[img]https://media.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExNzhqemVjb3hqdGxiZXB2dXVseXZtMWxib2t4cDI1ZHdwMTZibHFzbSZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/2QWxev1dP3207uun4p/giphy.gif[/img]

SComputers integration example: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3474640436

4395ac3c-cba1-4e9a-b7f6-d8b79ffc0e07.description:
[h3]Straightforward mod that automatically despawn creations to reduce lag.[/h3]

There are a few options to play with.

Type [i]/despawner[/i] in the in-game chat to display the settings GUI.
Settings persist but the Despawner must be enabled the first time loading up a world with the mod.

Alternatively, if you are more of a command line person, you can also modify the settings with the following commands:
[list]
[*][i]/despawnstatic[/i]
[*][i]/despawnseats[/i]
[*][i]/despawndelay[/i]
[*][i]/despawneffects[/i]
[*][i]/despawnenable[/i]
[/list]

[b]WARNING![/b] If you have unsaved creations in your world that you intend to keep, [b]SAVE THEM[/b] before enabling the mod. You should always be saving your creations anyway—it's just good practice. If your creation despawns, congratulations, the mod is doing exactly what it's supposed to do.
4395ac3c-cba1-4e9a-b7f6-d8b79ffc0e07.name: Despawner Mod

This Mod Replaces a handful of sounds, Ambience and adds a new radio track

How to Install:

Step 1. Go to your steam library → right click on the icon → select manage → browse local files

You should appear at C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic

Step 2. Navigate backwards to the steamapps folder

You should appear at C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps

Step 3. Navigate to the workshop → content → 387990 → 3299930163

You should appear at C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990/3299930163

Step 4. Copy the Data folder → navigate back to the Scrap mechanic folder

You should appear at C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic

Step 5. Paste the Data folder and when prompted select 'Replace contents'

Step 6. Close and re open Scrap mechanic and enjoy your new ambience, sound effects and Radio Music

Ambience Changes:

Metallic Monks by Mark Morgan

What Remains by Inon Zur

new spudgun sfx by Holesmak
new spud shotgun sfx by Holesmak

69545d9c-68a5-4756-bf86-4c098c87f2cf.description:
[h3]Fix for vanilla explosives glitching through objects[/h3]

Do you enjoy vanilla tank battles but find that Scrap Mechanic's physics sometimes let you down? High-speed launches of vanilla explosives can cause them to glitch through objects and fail to explode as expected. This mod fixes that issue. Additionally, explosives launched at characters (players or bots) will now explode correctly.

The mod patches the original vanilla explosives, meaning no new modded parts are introduced. This allows the mod to be enabled or disabled without any conflicts.

The fix retains a small portion of the original glitch to allow explosives to exit a creation without self-detonating. Achieving and balancing this was challenging and remains somewhat [i]experimental[/i]. Feedback on this aspect is especially appreciated. Small explosives will not explode within approximately 16 blocks (twice their destruction radius) from the launch point, and large explosives will not explode within approximately 32 blocks.
69545d9c-68a5-4756-bf86-4c098c87f2cf.name: Explosives Fix

THIS MOD REQUIRES THE CUSTOM AUDIO EXTENSION TO WORK!
HERE'S A STEP BY STEP INSTRUCTION:
1. Download and install the scrap mechanic DLL injector
   1.1 https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-DLL-Injector/releases/latest
   1.2 Click on "DLL-Injector-Installer.exe", this will download the exe
   1.3 Run the exe and install the injector
2. Download and install the scrap mechanic custom audio extension
   2.1 https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-CustomAudioExtension/releases/latest
   2.2 Click on "CustomAudioExtension.dll", this will download the dll
   2.3 Go to your steam library
   2.4 Right click Scrap Mechanic in the list
   2.5 Hover over "Manage"
   2.6 Click "View local files"
   2.7 Go into the "Release" folder
   2.8 Right click and create a NEW folder called "DLLModules"
   2.9 Move the previously downloaded "CustomAudioExtension.dll" into the newly created folder
   2.10 Close the file explorer
3. Profit!
--<=FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)=>--
1. Q: This looks like a file mod! Will this make me unable to play multipleyer?
    A: No, THIS DOES NOT AFFECT MULTIPLAYER! That's the beauty of DLL mods, they DO NOT affect multiplayer!
2. Q: My pc was warning me mutiple times during installation process! Is this safe?
    A: Yes! All mods from QuestionableMark are SAFE! I can not say that for any OTHER dll mods, so download those at your own risk.

77099040-adb8-40be-915f-e98271d8ca59.description:
This mod makes normally invisible zero width blocks and wonky joints visible, this makes its much easier to edit and tweak your blueprint edited builds.

[h1]What's a Zero Width Block?[/h1]

Zero width blocks, or sometimes referred to in the community as zwb's or 0wb's are normal blocks that have been blueprint edited such that one dimension of the block is a 0, this creates a flat panel sometimes with and without collision and they are normally invisible.

[h1]What's a Wonky object?[/h1]

They are either shapes or joints that have been blueprint edited in such a way that their right and forward face are made to face the same direction. Doing this to joints can create some very interesting properties that can be harnessed to create some very technical builds.

[h1]Commands:[/h1]

"/toggleviewer" - This command toggles the visibility of the zero width blocks and wonky joints.

[i]If there are any bugs, feel free to let me know in the comments, a like and favourite would also be greatly appreciated![/i]
77099040-adb8-40be-915f-e98271d8ca59.name: Zero Width Block Viewer

c252f7ee-6210-4368-bcaa-ce641d329490.description:
This mod adds new commands that allow you to create and load backups of all creations in your world.

In short, you can create a backup, change all creations in your world, and then restore them to how they were when you made the backup!

[h2]Examples:[/h2]
Ever wanted to play spleef with your friends, but don't want to clean up, load the blueprint on the lift, and then weld it again every single time you want to reset it?
Simply use the [b]/backup [name][/b] command to create a backup with the given name and use [b]/load [name][/b] when you want to load it again.

We all felt the urge to blow up a big creation we were building that's welded to the ground, but were too lazy to detach it and save it on the lift or create a copy of the save file.
With this mod you can simply [b]/backup [name][/b], blow it up, and once you are satisfied just [b]/load [name][/b]!

[h2]Commands:[/h2]
- [b]/backup [name][/b] - Creates a named backup of all creations in the world. [i](e.g. /backup myBackup)[/i]
- [b]/load [name][/b] - Loads the backup with the given name. [i](e.g. /load myBackup)[/i]
- [b]/revertload[/b] - Reverts the last load.

[hr]
[h3]Creations in the thumbnail:[/h3]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2026269994]Scrap Transporter[/url] by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Red-Builds]The Red Builder[/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2835755056]Ability to read[/url] by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Vajdani]Vajdani[/url]
c252f7ee-6210-4368-bcaa-ce641d329490.name: Backup Command

2514bebf-db4a-4d53-b2ba-57a6b291226b.description:
[h2]Expands Seats with more Features![/h2]
Control order changing, Control notes and colors, In-Seat interaction (Cockpit Clicker), more zoom and a Metric/Imperial Speedometer!

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Important![/h1]
[list]
[*]This is [b]NOT[/b] a file mod!
[*]This mod is compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3113900342]Crashlander[/url] (Singleplayer only, Multiplayer is broken for some reason and i can't fix it), [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3242683188]QuickSwap[/url] and most Gamemodes.
[*]This mod doesn't add any new parts (but does override the old creative seats), it [b] adds functionality to vanilla seats, saddles and their driver variants.[/b]
[*]If you use this mod in your blueprint and publish it, people without this mod [b]WILL[/b] be able to spawn it in, [b]but wont be able to experience these new features[/b], if they enable the mod after spawning in the blueprint, all the settings will take an effect!
[*]When using Creative Seats, they need to be respawned in order to have the functions, else they will work like before (excluding the broken character ragdoll)
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Features[/h1]
[list]
[*]New settings UI for Vanilla Seats:
	[list]
	[*]Control order changing
	[*]Control notes and colors
	[*]In-Seat interaction (Cockpit Clicker)
	[*]Turn off Jump Exit (Jumping will trigger button in 3rd slot instead)
	[*]Zoom++ (More zoom steps, thanks to Danzen for majorly improving this feature)
	[*]Metric/Imperial Speedometer
	[/list]
[*]Compatible with old Creative (or Level 12345) Seats
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Support:[/h2]
[*]Rate, Favorite, Share and Award!
[img]https://fagiano0.github.io/CrashlanderAPI/images/workshop/ratefavourite.gif[/img]
2514bebf-db4a-4d53-b2ba-57a6b291226b.name: Seats++

c71d4e4e-60ef-4540-9d36-344f4813fe51.description:
Simple mod that adds 3 recipes that allow you to turn raw stone into metal/scrap metal

Stone (5) --> Rubble (10)

Rubble (40) + Water (10) + Chemicals (20) --> Scrap Metal (10)

Rubble (40) + Water (5) + Chemicals (10) + Ember (1) --> Metal (5)

I've tried to make it balanced but it's still propably op xd

If it doesn't show in Craftbot, you need to add recipes manualy to "...Survival/Mod name\CraftingRecipes\craftbot.json" from "...\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\3327376996\CraftingRecipes\Manual install" at bottom of the file. There are planty guides on internet how to do it if you struggle :3
c71d4e4e-60ef-4540-9d36-344f4813fe51.name: Stone to Metal Recipes

59ba623f-db54-46d1-8199-cfc3556fc1cf.description:
This mod adds 3 type of Parts that work as counter weights for Bike Balancing.
These parts are 3x3x10 in size but the hitbox is only 1x1x0.2.
You can place them at the lowest position of your bike to make it stand upright.
with that you dont need any suspensions or piston glitches to make it balance.
it will also make the bike lean in the correct way when you turn.
Additional it will dampen the left/right swinging of the bike, its adjustable via a slider menu on the part.

Have fun with it.

4709ffab-26ed-43b0-97d2-a60ac85a942f.description:
saves data to the world and not to a block.
this approach allows you to save much more data.
files are saved after re-entering the world, but if you move the creation to another world, there will be a different set of files.
however, within the same world, you can save your creation to blueprint and load it from blueprint, everything will be fine in the files.
only the UUID of the file system that is stored inside the world is stored inside the block itself.
if you try to spawn two disks with the same UUID from the same blueprint, then all subsequent disks will change their UUID to a random one and copy the file system to a new UUID to avoid disk conflict.
however, you will not be able to use these disks to transfer files through the workshop.
4709ffab-26ed-43b0-97d2-a60ac85a942f.name: world disks [SComputers addon]

506bb974-03de-4f25-a7f7-f16dbd9f4311.description:
This mod is a GUI mod. With the files contained in this filepath, you can bring back the good old days GUI of version 0.3.5 and older of Scrap Mechanic.

// It was revisited because it would be more complicated than just paint over (should change some values in the XML files...).

Hope this mod makes you happy.




Mod location when you subscribe:
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990"

Folder's contain in the mod must be placed in:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Data\Gui



Manual Installation Instructions:
Navigate to the mod directory:

Open File Explorer.
Go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990.

Open the "Custom_GUI" folder

Navigate to the game's GUI directory:
Open a new File Explorer window.
Go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\Data\Gui.
Backup current GUI files:

In the mod directory :
Select the folders Gui and Resolutions , and the file gui_loadingscreen_axolot.png .
Right-click and select "Copy" (do not copy the Workshop_IMG folder).

Go back to the Scrap Mechanic Gui directory.
Right-click and select "Paste".
If prompted to replace existing files, confirm the replacement.


Launch Scrap Mechanic.
Check that the new GUI is installed and functioning as expected.

updated - 12-21-2024  - Added 4K resolution

[*]Do [b]NOT[/b] exit the save while carrying an interactable, it will lose its data!
[*]This mod is compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3113900342]Crashlander[/url] and most Gamemodes.
[*]If you use this mod in your blueprint and publish it, people without this mod [b]WILL[/b] be able to spawn it in and enjoy the blueprint fully!
[*]Parts may sometimes change color, if that ever happens just repaint it, it's a weird issue i can't seem to be able to fix.
[*]Placing carried interactables onto a creation that was on the Lift will make it detach from it (probably won't fix)
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Features[/h1]
[list]
[*]New Carry-All tool, which lets you carry any item! Crafted in the Craftbot (and the Workbench in Crashlander) in Compatible custom games.
[*]Carried items now keep their data if picked up via the Carry-All.
[*]"/deleteCarriedItems" command, which will clear the carry whenever any item enters it (only works in Unlimited inventory), useful for deleting a bunch of crafters for example.
[*]New UI showing the carried item Icon, Name and Color.
[*]Duplication mode for Creative, which lets you make a full on duplicate of any part, with all of its settings!
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Support:[/h2]
[*]Rate, Favorite, Share and Award!
[img]https://fagiano0.github.io/CrashlanderAPI/images/workshop/ratefavourite.gif[/img]
f8df5c4b-a095-469b-9369-c7eb593f6f52.name: Carry++

dae960eb-fe5c-4181-9d42-e815982911a1.description:
this mod allows you to emulate your favorite games from the NES platform right inside Scrap Mechanic!
this is a real emulator running inside the game, you can even connect a second controller and play with your friends!
just connect the console to the display and the joysticks to the console. insert the cartridge and play the NES right inside Scrap Mechanic!
the list of games will be updated, as well as in the future there will be support for add-ons for additional cartridges
audio emulation is not supported at the moment, but it will be supported in the future.
unfortunately, due to the restricted API of the game, when pressing several buttons in the joystick GUI, bugs sometimes occur and other buttons are released. if you install betterAPI, the button processing works fine, otherwise it is better to connect the controller with the seat.
you can connect the joystick to the seat to control the game from it. to import other control buttons, use the "Control Import" unit and connect it to the joystick.

controls:
wasd - crosshair
enter - start
i - select
o - B
p - A

unfortunately, the mod causes the STRONGEST LAGS!!! without betterAPI, the game runs at about 4-7 FPS and the console is slow. with betterAPI starting from version 40 (I added multithreading), the game outputs 70-120 FPS and the console runs at normal speed
i wish the developers of ScrapMechanic health and patience, and FINALLY MAKE A MULTITHREADED API FOR LUA!!
the emulator always works on the server side so that the game is synchronous for all players, so it is better that the host has a powerful processor. for the mod to work well, you need a single stream (high frequency)
dae960eb-fe5c-4181-9d42-e815982911a1.name: NES Emulator

590ec993-9907-43f7-8991-2fef0b24d499.description:
Build your own dot matrix displays!

Pre-built displays:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3368794318

VERSION 1.5:
Added LED
Bugfixes

MANUAL:
1. Weld the pre-built display or build you own with any glitchwelding tool and connect dots in pairs
2. Place down DotMatrix Controller, place down as many DotMatrix Encoders and switches (or whatever logic input) as many data there is
3. Connect switches (or whatever logic input) to corresponding encoders and encoders to controller.
4. Connect controller to the first left top dot in the display
5. Open excel, make cells square, select the area corresponding to size of the display and fill it with dot symbol (. , Ctrl + Enter). !You can search the internet for BUSE displays in OMSI 2 and download the fonts in excel file if you dont want to make them by yourself!
6. Draw whatever you want in the display area
7. Copy and paste finished board from excel to notepad
8. Copy the tabulation symbol from pasted output, press CTRL + H and paste that symbol in the first box, leave the second one empty and press enter
9. Copy the output, go to https://lingojam.com/TexttoOneLine and select "No spaces between" option and paste the output into first box
10. Copy output from the second box, paste it into "data" variable in this python script. Set the size of the board in "x_size" and "y_size" variables:
mappings = {
    "....": 0,
    "1...": 1,
    ".1..": 2,
    "..1.": 3,
    "...1": 4,
    "11..": 5,
    "..11": 6,
    "1.1.": 7,
    ".1.1": 8,
    ".11.": 9,
    "1..1": 10,
    "111.": 11,
    "11.1": 12,
    "1.11": 13,
    ".111": 14,
    "1111": 15
}

def process_data(data, x_size, y_size):
    result = []
    
    for y in range(0, y_size, 2):
        for x in range(0, x_size, 2):
            block = data[y * x_size + x : y * x_size + x + 2] + data[(y + 1) * x_size + x : (y + 1) * x_size + x + 2]
            result.append(mappings.get(block, "N/A"))
    
    return result

data = "" # put one-line data from excel

x_size = 88 # X size of the board
y_size = 16 # Y size of the board

result = process_data(data, x_size, y_size)

print(",".join(map(str, result)))

11. Copy the printed output and paste it into the encoder.
12. Activate the logic input in the that is connected to the encoder, and thats it!
590ec993-9907-43f7-8991-2fef0b24d499.name: Dot matrix displays

1d42c34f-760d-40d1-ae0e-c814ac774f82.description:
[h1]Scrapfarer[/h1]

Get to the end and find the treasure! Most testers never got close, so if anyone legitimately finishes the game I commend you.

It's a whole new game, good luck :)

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Features[/h2]
[list]
    [*]8 stages
    [*]New parts
    [*]New gameplay loop
    [*]25 blocks
    [*]Hours of suffering
    [*]Ducks and doughnuts
[/list] 

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Other[/h2]
Had to rush the release a bit because I want to work on other things, but it's playable. Also works in multiplayer, bit buggy, put bugs on the [url=https://github.com/Woukie/Scrapfarer]GitHub[/url].

[b][MODDERS][/b] If you fork the mod, make sure to change the mod id. And add something cool don't be lame and just re-upload it.

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Known Bugs[/h2]
[h3]Duplicate builds[/h3]
Sometimes re-spawning loads two identical boats, one liftable, one not. To fix, go to the red computer and [b]revert to last save[/b]

[h3]Damage when another player joins[/h3]
This one's on the chopping block. To resolve, just [b]jump into the water and die[/b].

[h3]No build/floor when joining[/h3]
When joining a world, sometimes there's no floor below the player, which causes the player to continually respawn and die. To resolve, [b]type /start, then /stop in chat[/b].

[h3]Flying boats[/h3]
If a boat was on the lift when you started a run, it will be loaded as a static creation when re-spawning, I cannot fix this. To resolve, [b]add+break a block on the build[/b] and make sure to take builds off the lift before starting a run.

Also, frequently save builds to the lift if you like them in case anything happens to them in game!

[h3]Switching plots on re-join[/h3]
This is intentional, and is a result of how plots are registered

[h3]Invisible second character[/h3]
Symptoms
[list]
    [*]Random damage
    [*]Randomly unlock shop items
    [*]Continuous dying
    [*]Other players see another nametag
[/list] 

To resolve, reloading the world may help, but I can't reliably recreate the bug to even begin patching this. 

This is one of those bugs where, no

46a378ec-d7b2-490a-a85a-cd0163a5ff0b.description:
A modded part that allows you to weld (and unweld) creations together without using the weld tool.

[b]Please watch the video for examples and usage instructions.[/b]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Updates[/h1]
[list]
[*]16/12/2024 - In survival mode, a bed (that's part of a creation with an auto welder) that has been set as a spawn point will be unset when a weld occurs. This has been fixed and spawn points correctly transfer over to welded creations.
[*]16/12/2024 - Deleting an auto welder while it is welded to another creation leaves an invisible indestructible block. This has been fixed and creations will now properly detach.
[*]10/12/2024 - Duplication bug potentially fixed. I'm leaving it in the "Known Issues" section below just in case.
[*]06/12/2024 - Now works with latest draggable wedges update.
[/list]

[h1]Example Creations[/h1]
[list]
[*]Picker & Docker: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3379870791
[*]Pole Climber: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3379871133
[*]Cube Assembler: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3379875001
[/list]

[h1]Survival Mode Compatibility[/h1]
This mod is in the ModDatabase. 
Custom game modes (such as Modded Craftbot Recipes) that make use of the database will have access to the recipe.

[h1]Known Issues[/h1]
[list]
[*]Downgrading a creation with an auto welder from version 0.7.0 (Physics & Wedge Update) or later to an earlier version will corrupt the position data of blocks.
[*]On rare occasions, creations become duplicated on welding. [i]*This has been fixed but left here for posterity*[/i]
[/list]
46a378ec-d7b2-490a-a85a-cd0163a5ff0b.name: Auto Welder

191a4e6c-894c-46e4-a1d7-1f1493d26b82.description:
[h2]Want to DeadLock-ify your boring Scrap Mechanic trader? Look no further![/h2]
A simple Blocks & Parts mod that makes the trader play the shop music from Valve's latest multiplayer hero shooter DeadLock.

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Important![/h1]
[list]
[*]This is [b]NOT[/b] a file mod!
[*]This mod doesn't add any new parts, it only modifies the Trader Hideout.
[*][h1][b]!!! Requires the Custom Audio Extension DLL mod !!![/b][/h1]
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h1]Installation[/h1]
1. Download this mod

2. Download and install the scrap mechanic DLL injector
2.1 https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-DLL-Injector/releases/latest
2.2 Click on "DLL-Injector-Installer.exe", this will download the exe
2.3 Run the exe and install the injector

3. Download and install the scrap mechanic custom audio extension
3.1 https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-CustomAudioExtension/releases/latest
3.2 Click on "CustomAudioExtension.dll", this will download the dll
3.3 Go to your steam library
3.4 Right click Scrap Mechanic in the list
3.5 Hover over "Manage"
3.6 Click "View local files"
3.7 Go into the "Release" folder
3.8 Right click and create a NEW folder called "DLLModules"
3.9 Move the previously downloaded "CustomAudioExtension.dll" into the newly created folder
3.10 Close the file explorer

4. Start up Scrap Mechanic and enable the mod on your game save

[hr][/hr]
[h2]Support:[/h2]
[*]Rate, Favorite, Share and Award!
[img]https://fagiano0.github.io/CrashlanderAPI/images/workshop/ratefavourite.gif[/img]
191a4e6c-894c-46e4-a1d7-1f1493d26b82.name: DeadLock shop music in trader's hideout

8ac1e7f3-2b43-4e64-b0af-f72a22e18d02.description:
[h2]UPDATE 05/12/2024: I have not currently checked if this custom game works with the latest "Physics & Wedge Update" released today. I will look into it when I have the time. I will update this text once I can confirm everything works with the latest update[/h2]

Uploaded as a separate custom game to not break peoples save files


This is a new version of my [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2823686440]lemonSurvival [/url]custom game mode, heres what it changes from the original custom game:

-Modded Craftbot Recipes
Simply add your mods to your world before loading in and you will see them in the craftbot if they are supported. (Full credits to the creators of Modded Craftbot Recipes)

New Terrain Changes
-Completely new start area. The crashed spaceship is now in the middle of randomly generated tiles to make starting new worlds less repetitive
-Hideout moved to south west corner

Mobile Craftbot
-Mk2 now has full craftbot recipes
Now you can build nomad vehicles without the big craftbot sticking out. The mobile craftbot is limited to 2 crafting slots only, hopefully this balances it out from the regular craftbot.

New Commands to customise your game.
/permadeath - When you die, you cannot respawn
/hprecovery - Disable hp recovery when you're not hungry
/hpgainfromfood - foods such as bananas, redbeets, sunshake etc. now give you hp when consuming.
Pair this with the last command to have a more unforgiving but still balanced survival experience.

Component kit drop changes
-Red Farmbot now drops around 10 component kits
-Tapebots drop around 2 component kits


Credits:
Dart Frog, Questionable Mark - Modded Craftbot Recipes
8ac1e7f3-2b43-4e64-b0af-f72a22e18d02.name: Ethan's Survival 2

- /kill Makes you respawn in 15 seconds (to avoid soft lockings). Also logs this action into the global chat.

- /night: works just like in creative!

- Gas Container
- Off-Road Suspension
- Square Mesh Block
- Large Rectangular Window

Shop changes:
- Framework block costs 99 glow

Fixes:
- Unused beds now break when the game starts

Future plans:
- All maps contain lights for night mode
- Lights and lamps for the shop
- More maps
- Third currency + TEAM UPGRADES


Original custom game: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2870930089
Original improved game: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2996323205

Orignal mod made by MJM, a great modder but he lost motivation to update the glitchwelder.
The orignal mod overall just has a lot of issues that hasnt been fixed since the start of survival.

-Place the glitch welder on a creation.
-Paint parts light-cyan blue then 'Press [E] to use' to cut/paste.
-Paint parts light green to paste as static in the world. (havent made this yet!)
-Paint the glitch welder itself the color you want to spawn the parts. (Unpainted welder spawns unpainted parts).
-Press U or the Upgrade button to re-paste the last items copied over and over. (Takes blocks from the inventory if you are in survival!)

d0ffe3fe-9b25-4e09-bed7-163623d234ce.description:
Welcome to the Beta Version of Space Scrapper!

Space Scrapper is an exciting custom game mode where you and your friends will embark on an interstellar adventure aboard a spaceship, exploring a dangerous and mysterious galaxy. The focus of this mod is on action and cooperation, offering a fun, thrilling experience rather than a realistic simulation.

Creating this mod is a challenging and time-consuming project for us, so we’re releasing this beta version (as a Block & Parts) to share our progress and gather your feedback. We hope you’ll find it engaging and maybe even want to support us!

Our goal is to fill the game with diverse and exciting encounters, such as space pirates, abandoned stations, shipwrecks, and much more. If you’d like to contribute, you can create and share your designs with us on Discord. We’d love to include community creations in our mod!

Feel free to join our Discord server to:

Discuss the project
Find friends to play with
Share your creations
Suggest ideas
Report bugs
📢 Join here: https://discord.gg/4MFd3etQTj


Here is our roadmap :

1. Create Block & Parts (Done)
2. Create a lot of Spaceships and Station (In progress, you can help us by sending your creation on our Discord)
3. Create the World (In progress)
4. Release the Custom Gamemode


========= CREDITS ===========


Many members of the community are currently helping us develop this mod, and I would like to personally thank those who have contributed their work to our project.

I would especially like to thank microvive30 for all the testing done, for all the suggestions and ideas shared, as well as the work on the mod's GUI: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199807043305/
d0ffe3fe-9b25-4e09-bed7-163623d234ce.name: Spaceship Parts
